Bold and refreshing this IPA combines an abundance of hops with smooth malt profile IBU

Titan IPA is big aggressively hopped India Pale Ale brewed for hop disciples It starts out with piney hop aromas and citrus hop flavors and finishes with nice rich malty sweetness that is balanced with crisp hop bitterness European Beer Star Nuremberg Silver Medal IPA Australian International Beer Awards Silver Medal IPA Australian International Beer Awards Silver Medal IPAFOOD PAIRINGS Grilled lamb burger Thai green curry roasted zucchini pesto Cabot sharp cheddar carrot cake

A Golden Rye IPA An outstanding hop from New Zealand Nelson Sauvin is generously used throughout the brewing and dry hopping of this unique beer European rye is added for smooth malty addition to flavor OG AB
Citra and Simcoe Hops impart fruity and earthy notes for new twist on flavorful friend This IPA packs hoppy wallop

Blend two Dogfish Head favorites add maple syrup and carbonate the mixture naturally What do you get Minute IPA The carbon dioxide trapped during bottle conditioning gives Minute IPA soft and velvety mouthfeel Dry hopped with whole leaf Cascades this complex IPA has been known to inspire pilgrimages to our brewpub
Formerly Northern Hemisphere Harvest Wet Hop Ale

This mammoth IPA is defined by generous quantities of juicy American hops The extensive dry hopping process contributes to its bright and flavorful character This beer is unfiltered to leave all the natural flavors intact and bottle conditioned to stay super fresh Malt Bill Munich Wheat Row Hops Columbus Chinook Cascade Simcoe GoldingDry Hop Simcoe US Golding IBU

Formerly Loose Cannon American Hop AleBurnished gold with rich citrus hop aroma it is wonderfully drinkable with big hop flavor We ve knicknamed it Hop hop cubed ale to reflect the enormous amount of hops in this beer over pounds per barrel It is hopped ways in the kettle in the hop back and dry hopped
This Killer IPA earns its name by using six different types of hops while still remaining an aggressive well balanced beer

A vibrant hop bursted session IPAFirst Release March Since Day One we ve been abundantly forthright and fully transparent about our lust for hops It led us to craft many an IPA most of them imperial some intense for their time and all timeless in their intensity For Stone Go To IPA we embrace our hop obsession in new way funneling an abundance of lupulin borne bitterness into session IPA that delivers all the fruity piney character of much bigger IPA To accomplish this we employ hop bursting new technique wherein an irrational amount of hops is added during the final phase of the brewing process to coax out extreme flavors and aromas while also imparting burst of desirably pleasant bitterness The result is an alpha acid rich beer that fans can enjoy more of without missing out on the assertive hop character you like us crave So sit back and go two with your new everyday go to IPA and bask along with us in the glory of the almighty hop

The champagne like bubbles distinctive hop bouquet and balanced character of Liberty Ale revives centuries old ale brewing traditions that are now more relevant than ever First introduced in Liberty Ale is brewed strictly according to traditional craft brewing methods and uses only natural ingredients pale malted barley fresh whole cone Cascade hops and special top fermenting yeast and water The yeast used during fermentation produces many of Liberty Ale subtle flavors and characteristics natural process called bunging creates gentle carbonation and the practice of dry hopping adding fresh hops to the brew during aging revived by Anchor creates its unique aroma Liberty Ale was first brewed to celebrate the bicentennial of Paul Revere historic ride As the first modern American IPA brewed after prohibition and the first modern American single hop ale and dry hopped ale Anchor Liberty Ale is the original craft brewed ale and the historic beer that started revolution

A potent snakebite of Citra Mosaic Warrior Simcoe and Columbus hops more than lbs per barrel gives this beer its citrus forward superpower Orange and tropical fruit aromas temper slightly piney crispness turning Snake Dog into more complex breed of West Coast IPA You ll find Snake Dog bites hardest when paired with peppery cheeses curries and mild Thai dishes whose names you can pronounce properly IBU

BREW FREE OR DIE IPA is brewed with some serious west coast attitude This aromatic golden IPA starts with three different hops to the nose quickly balanced by solid malt backbone supporting the firm bitterness Our top selling beer at the pub this IPA starts big and finishes clean leaving you wanting more

Redhook Long Hammer IPA is brewed with generous addition of hops during the boil and dry hopped at the end of fermentation The result is an India Pale Ale with piney and citrusy hop aroma and flavor and crisp finish Redhook Long Hammer IPA is West Coast classic and one of America most drinkable IPAs

Sierra Nevada Hop Hunter IPA will feature hop oil from distilled hops The idea which Sierra Nevada hasn fully revealed will extract pure hop oil from mature cones to create an IPA that smells unlike any other IPA you ve had Aroma is key Sierra Nevada Hop Hunter IPA should finish at ABV IBUs

Inspired by West Coast P s but brewed with Michigan style The Crooked Tree is heavily dry hopped to give it big aroma of pine and citrus The flavors are big yet very balanced between fresh hops and malt Often described as grapefruit our hops give this beer an excellent fruit flavor that finishes dry

An American hop assault for all the ambivalent warriors who get the girl in the end Look ain in this for your revolution and m not in it for you Princess This iconic ale features blend of four hop varieties which creates crisp bitterness and imparts massive floral and citrus aromas IBU

Pale and Vienna malts along with different US hop varietiesWe took the traditional IPA originally shipped from England to India in the and made it bolder and more flavorful American Style We added new varieties of highly aromatic American hops to create distinctive bitterness profile and an incredible hop character

Our Hop Ottin IPA is brewed and dry hopped with copious amounts of Columbus and Cascade This beer is showcase of the bright citrusy aromas bold grapefruit and pine like flavors and resiny bitterness that hop heads crave With brilliant deep amber color and solid malt backbone hints of citron roses and bergamot climax with dry herbal finish in this well balanced interpretation of West Coast IPA
A Colorado IPA with crisp juicy and resinous hops and rich malty finish IBUs

Two inflammatory words one wild drink Nectar imprisoned in bottle An anything but delicate blend of sharp hoppiness and fruity aroma this beer is life changing backyard knife fight for your palate Once you ve had Raging Bitch everything else pales in comparison Fermented with volcano like Belgian yeast strain called El Diablo Raging Bitch earned its polarizing name from the aggressively active nature of the yeast unleashed untamed unbridled and in heat Enjoy its golden glow and white foaming head alongside bold flavors like spicy BBQ wings blue cheese salads or that bag of family sized Cool Ranch Doritos you re going to destroy later while binge watching Netflix Malts CaramelHops Warrior Columbus AmarilloYeast Belgian El Diablo IBU
Fermented with the Westmalle yeast strain IBU

The gnomes of Fairyland may be little but they have big very big personalities HOUBLON CHOUFFE matches their impish spirits All gnomes with their innate good taste are in full agreement about HOUBLON CHOUFFE which is flavoured by three different types of hops This India Pale Ale is appreciated for its pronounced bitterness combined with the fruity tones of traditional Achouffe beers it softens the strongest of characters

Le Freak is the first ever hybrid ale of its kind the convergence of Belgian Style Trippel with an American Imperial IPA This zesty Amarillo dry hopped bottle conditioned marvel entices with fruity Belgian yeast aromatics and firm dry finish Aromas of orange and passion fruit with sweet bready malts and flavors of orange marmalade and citrus fruit pith Experience legendary beer

This winter IBUs start accumulating like snow in Colorado with our new Accumulation White IPA Brewing white IPA was not only way to salute the white beauty falling from the sky but direct revolt to the longstanding tradition of brewing dark beers for winter At least that what our rebellious brewer Grady Hull likes to claim as he shovels in plenty of new hop varietals and bit of wheat for smooth mouthfeel Stack up few cases of Accumulation White IPA to keep your long nights glowing blizzard white

Belgian style double IPA with Brettanomyces this ale is aged in french oak chardonnay barrels Brewed with Apollo Citra and Simcoe hops Dry hopped in the barrel with Citra hops Triple fermented First in the tank with Belgian yeast second in french oak chardonnay barrels with brett and finally in the bottle with third yeast for natural carbonation IBU

XX Bitter or Extra Extra Bitter is blond bitter ale containing vol Alc It famous for its very bitter and strong flavour XX is made with pale pilsner malt and loads of Brewers Gold and Hallertau hop flowers perfect combination that has been nationally and internationally praised This ale has been real trendsetter for the current comeback of bitter ales in Belgium Only whole leaf hops are used
White IPA brewed Galaxy hops kumquats corriander peppercorns Fermented in French Oak Foudres Bottle Conditioned Brett

A collaboration dedication ale brewed with our friend Urbain from the Belgian brewery De Struise this intense Belgian style double IPA was fermented with Urbain special yeast and then an amazing amount of hops were added This beer was brewed in loving memory of former employee Rich Sheppard who passed away on Art by Tommy Borst Try this beer and enjoy the Rich life IBUFormerly served on draft as Shark Pants

Hugh Malone begins with grain bill featuring blend of Maine grown barley imported Pilsner and raw wheat malt At the beginning of run off we add portion of hops to the sweet wort in the kettle technique known as first wort hopping As the boil begins generous amount of Chinook hops are added for bittering Later in the whirlpool the beer is hopped with blend of Centennial and Amarillo for aroma This same blend is used post fermentation to lend additional hop character to the finished beer The result is complex brew with malty palate intense hop aromas pronounced bitterness and pleasantly dry finish
Hommel beer brewed with Hallertau and East Kent Goldings hops from Belgium hop growing region

A summer sipper built for lawn chairs lawn games and lawn mowing Fresh Slice features the spicy estery flavor profile of Belgian yeast laced with the juicy hop flavors and aromas of American hops This White IPA recipe tips the scales with slice of clementine hit of coriander and an th of wait what This one features crisp fresh citrus ripeness deriving from additions of clementine juice and sweet orange peel in the brew process The first Otter Creek can offering this is one slice you ll be holding all summer long
Bedlam chaotic blend of Citra hops and Belgian yeast give this IPA aromas of summer fruits and bright hop presence with plush finish

The Last Will is born from meeting between the Belgian and British brewing traditions It has complex nose of flowers and alcohol supported by slightly fruity and malty flavors all topped by strong hop bouquet In the mouth it is spicy and fruity hints and discrete touch of alcohol In the final hops up the rear with force
Belgian Double IPA
This hoppy Belgian style golden ale first appeared in early as the first edition of our Short Batch Series At that time we called it the Gnome an homage to Brasserie Achouffe IBU

Piraat triple hop is balanced complex brew with defined hop character Brouwerij Van Steenberge uses the famous Piraat ale as the base providing the brew with full bodied fruity flavor from the malt blended with dry characteristics derived from the high levels of alcohol Then four different hops are added into the brew three times during the brewing process hence triple hop The hops pitched are saaz tetra and aurora twice in the brew house and then cascade is used to dry hop These four hop styles deliver complex character which stands up to the great name of Piraat

Ken Hermann has taken our exploration of and adoration for the IPA style in completely new direction With notes of orange peel and coriander the soft mouthfeel reminiscent of Belgian wit and the hop additions of Simcoe Citra and Cascade he strikes delicate balance between two disparate styles while showcasing the characteristics of both It a refreshing take on new style and we hope you enjoy it Cheers IBU

Glaucus is the mythological existence of being both man and fish deity amongst mere mortals The only beer fitting of such name marries bold spicy Belgian yeast with bright citric American hops in way even the gods adore This golden brew can calm even the harshest seas It been awhile since we ve brewed this beer and we couldn be happier that it back

What happens when year old Belgian style ale gets rear ended by truckload of pompous American hops It equals one heck of an ambulance chaser of beer This is an American style Belgian IPA with subtle phenolic ﬂavor in combination with citrusy piney hops well balanced at and IBUs with tart dry ﬁnish World Beer Cup Bronze Medal winner for American Belgo Style Ale category Grains Row Wheat Flaked OatsHops Bravo Ahtanum Centennial CascadeDry Hop Ahtanum Centennial Simcoe IBUs

Legend has it Ghostrider roams Utah Wasatch Range seeking revenge someone stole his White IPA recipe Smooth and crisp it made from pale barley and citrusy hops It too good to hide Ghostrider is an unfiltered White IPA brewed with coriander
orange and pineapple pineapple mango and passion fruit mango and tangerine orange and pineapple guava pineapple and tangerine

Big bold and balanced this double IPA is unlike most We take an artistic Belgian approach to our beer Our brewers sling some serious Citra hops into the kettle as you might expect but we overlay that excessive hoppiness with Belgian candi sugar to add dimension to this beer The result is siege of hop flavor without the bitterness Tree Bucket catapults out of the brewery once year Hoppy beers are not for cellaring Find it drink it enjoy it now

An artful creation which began with our HopAnomaly Belgian Style IPA enhanced by month maturation in French Oak Chardonnay Barrels This version of Hop God is fascinating big bold Belgian style Tripel hopped in very high amounts to concentrate citrus grapefruit and floral aromatics in the nose The addition of Chardonnay barrel aging adds further dimension and oak tannins to an already wonderfully complex Ale bringing to mind tropical fruits and peach We know of nothing that compares enjoy IBU

This Pale American Belgo style beer was GABF silver medal winner It has notes of spicy pineapple mango bubblegum aromas which comes from the unique marriage of special Belgian yeast and an American Simcoe hop This beer has an initial soft malt sweetness with orange fruitiness and finishes with hoppy dryness

Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster is Belgian style Double IPA brewed with Australian Galaxy hops The nose is an impressive dank blend of citrus aromas reminiscent of guava and lemons very green and fresh with subtle Belgian yeast esters An intense clean bitterness dominates the flavor profile with little malt character to compete with slight fruity yeast sweetness is noticeable in the finish alongside resounding bitterness

We re no monks but our Belgian style IPA gives tip of the hat to our divine brethren Brewed with rich malt noble hops Trappist yeast and kick of coriander this is one complex beer Rather than make beer that more of dare to drink than pleasure balance was the priority here We wanted beer for hop heads and novices alike Hop Trapp pours with refined bitter backbone floral hoppy notes and decidedly Belgian finish This brew is worthy of some serious contemplation

Hardywood Bourbon DIPA is hopped with heavy dose of Columbus Cascade and Summit hops fermented with an abbey ale yeast that imparts some subtle tropical fruit and peppery notes and conditioned twelve weeks in freshly emptied Virginia bourbon barrels from the Smith Bowman Distillery where earthy vanilla toffee and bourbon notes lend an exquisite mellowness to Bourbon DIPA IBU

Joe multinational take on classic IPA IPA are known for their intense hop bitterness flavor and aromas First Joe used American and English malt then American and English hops are added during the mash first wort boil and finally it dry hopped for aroma Belgium gets involved with the yeast and special candy sugar finish for smoothness and flavor

Previously known as Hop God beautiful golden crossbreed of Belgian Tripel and West Coast IPA remarkable explosion on the palate with spiciness tropical fruit and firm citrus bitterness that will leave you begging for more Aromas of grapefruit citrus and piney hops tastes on the palate that tend toward pineapple mango and sweeter fruits big beer that was inspired by the West Coast yet brewed by Midwestern brewery not content with the status quo IBUThis listing is for the draft only version of the beer that is NOT barrel aged Bottles should be reviewed here http beeradvocate com beer profile
Thai Style White IPA

Inspired by our love of Belgian ales and hoppy West Coast ales We bring Cascade and Columbus hops together with our house yeast for smooth Belgian style hopfest Best when fresh this beer is not intended for aging
A very hoppy citrus nose leads this beer with low malt and high hops in flavor The Belgian yeast leaves the palate creamy instead of dry This is an awe some beer for Belgian and hop fans alike
Kinda like Daytime big dark and scary sidekick this ale is packed full of highly roasted malts then bitterly balanced with fistfuls of the dankest hops Not for the lunch crowd or the faint of heart

A heavy malt foundation includes Crystal malt for sweetness and just enough Midnight Wheat malt to push the color to black The bitterness is huge but balanced by malt sweetness and alcohol burn The hop flavors and aromas range from citrus to floral to pine thanks to delicious blend of hand selected Chinook and Centennial hops IBUs
ABV varies around IBU
Toasted chocolaty dark malts align with an astronomical amount of hops IBU
According to the brewery website dark IPA Available November to January

Pleasantly hoppy Snow Day carries the subtle chocolate and caramel flavors of new brewing malt known as Midnight Wheat The Styrian Golding Centennial and Cascade hops bring the backbone of hoppy bitterness to complement the roasty undertones This beer is the deep garnet of roasted walnut and presents creamy tan head floating artfully atop Snow Day is bold and hoppy drinkable and strong
An India Black Ale Available May to SeptemberAlc by Vol IBUs

Conceived in dimly lit room on blistery cold night in the Upper Peninsula of Michigan but born and raised here in Marshall Michigan The Reserve Special is the oldest of all beers in the Dark Horse family It has an incredibly thick presence and when poured into glass its color is so dark it eerie The flavors explode onto your taste buds with heavy malt roast and chocolate but stay very balanced The Reserve Special Black Ale has hard time being called stout or porter but it fits nicely into the category of delicious strong black ale
Black India pale ale aged in maple syrup bourbon barrels

Originally brewed as one time release called now seasonal called simply Pitch Black IPA availability January Aprilbitterness IBUalcohol by volume original gravity PLATOMalts Two Row Pale Caramel Special Roast Carafa Special IIHops Bittering AlchemyAroma Alchemy CascadesDry Hop Cascade

Just when you thought it was safe to come out of the root cellar along comes Grainstorm big wet wallop to the senses In the glass dark and turbulent clouds gather high pressure system of pungent hops collides with stationary front of barley wheat and rye The forecast veritable monsoon of flavor with surges of roasty malt microbursts of hops and chance of golfball sized hail The extended outlook calls for unseasonably pleasant enjoyment IBU

The Duck Rabbit Hoppy Bunny American Black Ale is both intensely hoppy and intensely black Eight separate hop additions offer delicious bitterness and beguiling hop aroma flavor Heavily represented among these hops are Chinook which provides deep pine and sticky citrus components and New Zealand hop called Motueka from which we get bright fruit and spearmint notes

Black Racer blends Bear Republic love of hops with the Pacific Northwest appreciation for dark ales Our pit crew brews this award winning ale which boldly defines new frontier of flavors and always maintains pole position Race to the Dark Side Bronze Great American Beer Festival American Style Black AleGold World Beer Cup American Style Black Ale

Hop Strike is dry hopped black rye IPA The beer is characterized by an intermingling of spicy citrus hops and chocolate malt Substantial IBUs are balanced by roasted rye resulting in nice depth of malt character and deep color

Close Encounter is bold venture into depths unknown The best of both worlds co exist between rich roasted malt er character and an aggressive hop presence that will probe your taste buds like thing you have experienced before Don fear the unknown embrace it You never know who or what you may encounter

Formerly Death Of Contract BrewerDeath seems so obvious the end of life no mas kaput But Humans stand an optimistic animal Many traditions suggest alternate endings Resurrection reincarnation rebirth afterlife Even the atheist view of Eternal Oblivion doesn seem quite final more of shift in spiritual states of un consciousness As usual Jewish tradition prescribes Food days of family community and bagels beer called Shiva meaning in Hebrew The flip side to the days of Creation with the th as holy day of rest The first meal of Shiva is the comfort meal And the number provides powerful mojo Jewish wedding blessings Liberal Arts Lucky Japanese gods stars of the Big Dipper colors of the rainbow seas license to kill dwarves We are by Wordsworth with child view of death deadly sins Best of finals in NBA NHL MLB th Inning stretch no on Elway Tiny Archibald George Costanza yearned to name his firstborn as living tribute to no Mickey Mantle The Award however must go to the immortal George Carlin for Dirty Words inspired by another hero Lenny Bruce Coming into years of beer and Year no with our own Brewery we commemorate this conversion with Death Of Contract Brewer our Shmaltz homage to new life Chaim Jeremy Cowan proprietor MALTS Specialty row Munich Crystal Rye Wheat Chocolate Pale Chocolate Kiln Coffee HOPS Cascade Citra Summit Crystal Amarillo Ahtanum Chinook IBU

While birds of feather stick together their wings should not We blew our cap seeing images of oilslick seabirds and thinking about what may happen to more of our fine feathered friends as they migrate south this fall so we hatched this flighty idea for specialty brew called Toxic Sludge All of the proceeds will benefit Tri State Bird Rescue Research Spreading Our Wings campaign and their efforts to build Wildlife Response Annex To learn more please visit www tristatebird orgIn times of crisis like this we figure you can either hibernate or participate Try this tasty dry hopped black IPA It as smooth as water off duck back So everytime you drink one please let out loud squawk in honor of our beautiful beaked brethen We hope you can dig deep in your hearts and pockets to help support the effort Be Well Mark Pete

James was our Uncle Edward James Hill Jr Hill Farmstead Brewery rests upon the land that was once home to him and his four siblings In his honor this Black Ale is dutifully crafted from American and German malted barley American hops our ale yeast and water from James well It is unfiltered naturally carbonated and dry hopped Roasty and smooth with accents of chocolate and balanced hoppy finish this is the ale that dream to have shared with James Pale and Caramel Malt Roasted Barley Centennial and Columbus hops Ale Yeast and our Well Water
A Black IPA full of tropical fruit players and assertive bitterness and hint of roasted malt Featuring Citra hops

From the blackest depths of the brewhouse comes Damien Child of Darkness Spawned from the usually discarded remnants of Darkness Damien is dry hopped black ale with flavors of roasted malt and dark brown sugar Tangerine and pine aromatics only add to its insidious appeal

Lose yourself in this voluptuous beast of beer twenty first century hop overdose This mother will seduce you ravish you and you ll be back gagging for more Adore it Lust for it Fall for it Libertine Black Ale is dark hop bomb combining the hop awesomeness of an IPA the decadent and indulgent malt flavours of stout with an insatiable drinkability that belies the punch that this beer packs Dark Knight amongst pale knaves Taste the hops live the dream Learn to speak beer love fruit and never forget you come from long line of truth seekers dreamers and warriors the outlaw elite Ride toward anarchy and caramel craziness Let the sharp bitter finish rip you straight to the tits Swallow hard this beer bites IBU
Imperial Black IPA

Our black IPA is bursting with crisp clean bitterness and layers of wonderful American hop character Pale Ale Munich and Naked Golden Oats give toasty malt backbone with smooth mouthfeel The dark ominous color comes from the Chocolate Malt and the de husked highly roasted malt We want the layers of hops to shine against this roasty malt backdrop Warrior Citra Chinook Centennial and Amarillo lend bitterness as well as wonderful cornucopia of aromas and flavors of fresh citrus fruit pine fresh cut mint and fresh flowers they offer IBU
This black India pale ale is loaded with hops balanced with delicious maltiness It was brewed with our friends from the great city of New Orleans in the band EyeHateGod
Don let its looks deceive you Clean and smooth easy on the hops and easy on the palate this light bodied ale has surprising depth of malt flavors with pleasant hints of smoky molasses

Massive in every way Craft delivers complex bundle of flavors with citrus hop aroma Moving beyond the massive hop aroma rich roasted malt flavors of coffee and chocolate move forward only to be checked by an impressive hop bitterness Texture and flavor dance together so seamlessly that you may need to remind yourself that while it drinks like session it delivers like an assassin

Hop Noir is delectable Black IPA dripping with piney aromatic Centennial hops The malt base is dark and rich anchored by organic black malt This provides strong foundation for the extravagant kettle hopping and dry hopping that this beer experiences Enjoy with night light IBU

Barrel Aged Double Shot Double Black Ale is an amped up version of the Duluth brewery Cold Press Black Ale with twice the cold press and two doses of whole Madagascar vanilla beans If that wasn enough Bent Paddle aged the beer for months in bourbon barrels Keep an eye for more information on when and where to find bottles

We don have many rules at Carton Brewing and those we have we made up for ourselves In general though we strive for drinkability through balance and harmonization of flavors But even self imposed rules are meant to be broken With Epitome we decided to embrace the teenage metalhead in each of us and get discordant with seriously hoppy high gravity black ale The only notions accepted were to make it bigger bolder hotter faster Beast The ABV had to push past the black had to be none more and the hops had to be American and piled on like double bass drum kicking faster and harder Drink Epitome because things worth doing are worth over doing https www youtube com watch FXRyuocSG list UUnNILcyxWbvjLRKg

A hefty Black Ale with profound malt and hop complexity Neither Stout nor Porter it will be its own thing full bodied bold and black Flavor characteristics of dark chocolate mocha molasses and dark fruits Balanced by piney citrusy notes of Pacific Northwest hops Full bodied and uncommonly satisfying at alcohol

We ve finalized new Black Ale for Half Acre We can all sit on sun drenched patios and freely spill speed beer down our throats till paid transportation takes us home You want to squirrel away couple tra pales and head to yoga No problem Namaste But there are times when fleshy black beer is the only thing that offers the necessary weight Visiting your uncle machine shop to thread some pipe before hitting dirt track sprint car race You might want to digest some Lead Feather Black Ale The might of big malts and rival hop use give Lead Feather capital dark properties ABV gives you time but not at the expense of content

The first release in the Ales from the Dark Side series dark roasted twist on the traditional IPA that uses an absurd amount of malt and is octo hopped with the German Perle hop The biggest beer in the RJ Rockers linup to date
A hoppy black IPA bursting with so much flavor that you might think you re tasting double Intensely floral nose surprisingly light body and strong bitter finish
This is the oz canned Real Ale version

Duuuuuuuude pass that No not that The bottle opener Thanks man Yeah Psssssh so m drifting through the galazy and scored this Black IIPA brewed with like kilos like kilos man of this Galaxy strain of hops and like those sweet sweet nectars of bees It pairs like so well with Doritos and ice cream sandos Duuuuuuudeee let go to that place with that grilled cheese What We already went there tonight Oh This is like that time thought wrote the Matrix
Formerly known as Flying Monkeys Netherworld India Pale Porter IBU
Foster is our Black Wheat IPA brewed with large percentage of malted wheat and hopped with our favorite American hop varieties

This is our Brut IPA new take on IPA brewed for bone dry champagne style finish Late hop additions give the beer balanced bitterness and bright pop of citrus flavor It as intriguing as it is drinkable BITTERING HOPS SimcoeFINISHING HOPS Comet Crystal Chinook SimcoeMALTS Two row Pale Wheat Acidulated IBU
Listing for all Stone Enjoy By xx xx xx Brüt IPA beers Featured Hops Nugget Super Galena Simcoe Delta Target Amarillo Cascade Galaxy Citra Nelson Sauvin Motueka Helga

Ommegang Brut IPA is brewed with pilsner malt and flaked corn and hopped and dry hopped with Mandarina Bavaria Calypso and Citra varietals followed by two week bottle conditioning process to achieve exceptional levels of carbonation It pours light straw color with crystalline clarity Aromas of dank resinous pine grapefruit and pineapple precede lively effervescence and crisp dry finish
A brand new Brut or extra dry IPA featuring Citra and Mosaic It got beautiful pungent candy like and tropical aroma with light body mild haze and low bittnerness on the snappy effervescent finish

Don freak out This beer is sediment free That on purpose uses the same hops as combined with the brut brewing technique which results in clear and dry beer with no sugar and carbs It meant to be That on purpose Enjoy IBU

Like fine Brut Champagne Founders latest IPA is brilliantly clear highly effervescent and refreshingly dry Designed for more sophisticated IPA drinker Civilized Brut has clean and restrained bitterness And the lack of haze and malt sweetness allows the hop flavors and aromas to tantalize your palate in bold yet never overpowering way There nothing savage about this brute this IPA is well refined and elegant
A new hero is soaring in from completely new direction the effervescent Brut Hero sparkling with white grape passionfruit and lemon notes and capped with an extra dry champagne like finish

A style truly born of Californian roots our Brut Extra Dry IPA has very aromatic nose thanks to ample additions of Simcoe and Amarillo hops Brewed and fermented with almost no residual sugars generous amounts of Chinook hops impart clean citrus flavors with moderately low bitterness As Brut is the sparkling wine designation for being very dry this IPA main attraction is the nice dry finish that is perfectly balanced by fruity esters and crisp malt backbone IBU

Huge tropical hop aromatics with an exceptionally dry finish wealth of Galaxy and Citra hops added post boil give this Brut IPA low actual bitterness and big tropical flavor Fruity and citrus notes abound in this smooth and refreshing Champagne like brew Moral Panic Brut IPA is well carbonated and spritz drinks easy and finishes dry IBU

Brut IPA is our latest deep dive into the ever more complex world of IPA This bone dry IPA features light body matched only by its light bitterness But don be fooled this beer is exploding with juicy citrus hop character in what is undoubtedly fantastic voyage into unknown waters

Juicy Brut is sessionable Ale with the best of both hop juiciness and brut dryness It has relentless tropical aroma emphasized by the increased carbonation level This easy drinking beer has light body filled with tropical juicy flavors before finishing dry

IPA is fickle beast now bitter now hazy now dry AF Luckily this is trend we agree with wholeheartedly The Brut Squad is bone dry effervescent aromatic and remarkably civilized Brewed with Idaho and Citra Cryo hops

Collaboration with Miller Brewing CompanyHoppin Bubbly Brut IPA celebrates the classic malt bill from The Champagne of Beers and Terrapin affinity for IPAs Innovative brewing and dry hopping techniques help create beer that has crisp bone dry finish and an aromatic hop profile Pair with blue cheese or sharp cheddar Also goes great with sausage tenderloin or terrine HOPS Cascade Amarillo Citra MosaicMALTS Moravian Flaked Corn Flaked Rye IBU
A citrus aroma balanced with hops and an effervescent champagne like mouthfeel

We don joke about beer So while many thought it was an April Fool joke when we announced Rouge Brut IPA blended with Pinot Noir juice and dedicated to typos we knew it was real and it was spectacular The label is an anagram of our name Rogue And it been the most common misspelling of our brand since day one We can count the times we ve received phone calls for Rouge Alés and we relish the opportunity to recount that one time our brewer yeast was accidentally delivered to the gentleman lounge Club Rouge in Portland instead of Rogue Eastside Pub Pilot Brewery Heck we ve even been guilty of misspelling our own name once or twice It such common gaffe we ve even given it term getting rouged After years of getting Rouged we felt it was time to embrace our rougey roots and brew something delicious in honor of it Rogue Innovation Brewer Michael King started with brut IPA dry but aromatic example of the IPA style combining Row Malt Corn Flakes and Rolled Oats For hops he selected Mosaic Chinook El Dorado Strata Rogue Farms Alluvial He of course used our proprietary Pacman Yeast and Newport own Free Range Coastal Water And for real Rogue Rouge twist on it all he blended it with Oregon Pinot Noir juice The result is crisp and semi dry brut IPA co fermented with Oregon Pinot Noir juice for unique flavor and an added rouge hue The finish is hoppy and delicious
Yet another new IPA style Fermented very dry with almost no residual sugar along with retained bitterness showcase the full flavor and aromas of the hops finishing clean and crisp

BREWED FOR CHAMPAGNE STYLE ON BEER BUDGETFestive and crisp Liquid Stardust sparkles like few if any IPAs Far out waves of hop flavor and aromatics pack celebratory punch while the clean champagne like finish begs for another sip

Double Brut IPA with mango and black currant celebrating the th batch brewed at Short Powerful flavors of mango fruitiness and black currant tartness blend with alcohol notes from the high ABV huge amount of hops contributes to palate coating body that smooths as you enjoy more The burnt orange color is indicative of the warming finish

Champagne and IPAs You think these two libations would have nothing to do with each other but we thought we join em in hoppy matrimony Brut IPA is very light bodied with clean dry palate thanks to lively citrus and white grape notes from Amarillo and Hallertau Blanc hops plus bit of malts It bubbly sparkly low carb hoppy and heck elegant Drink with an open mind and we re sure you ll love this extra pale wonder Malts Pilsner Malted Wheat Acidulated MaltHops Amarillo Hallertau Blanc SimcoeIBU COLOR Extra Pale

Brut IPA brewed Amarillo Cascade and Citra with ridiculous amount of Peach and Blood Orange Inspired by brunch cocktails like Bellinis and Mimosas we brewed it with simple malt bill of pilsner and added flaked rice to lighten the body and add subtle coconut creaminess to the flavor We added small amount of cascade to the whirlpool then fermented on over lbs per gallon of peaches and ½ lbs per gallon of blood oranges Black Tie Optional fermented to degrees Plato for an extremely dry finish that really allows all that fruit to shine We dry hopped with Amarillo and Citra to compliment the fruit and tie all the flavors together

Break out the bubbly it time to celebrate Daymaker sparkling Brut Rosé IPA is crisp dry and refreshing toast to the best days the not so great days and everything in between days because every day is reason to celebrate if you ask us So go on make day of it Malts Row PaleHops Hallertau blanc Melon Saphir Lemon Drop IBU

Hooray for the Cascade hop The hop that changed the beer biz This Brut IPA uses champagne yeast to create crisp dry IPA with citrus backbone The mighty Cascade hop helps deliver it classic floral aroma and spicy citrus notes on the finish Dry and deliciously drinkable

Black Tie Required is our Brut IPA brewed with Belma hops and conditioned on Raspberries and Strawberries Similar to Black Tie Optional we used light base malt of pilsner and rice then fermented it down to degrees plato for super dry finish Towards the end of fermentation we added over lbs per gallon of Raspberries and Strawberries to the fermenter then dry hopped with more Belma hops Black Tie Required is big on raspberries and strawberry flavor from the large dose of fruit and accentuated by strawberry citrus character of the Belma hop but drinks dry and slightly tart from the low final gravity and acidity of the fruit

This Brüt IPA was brewed to perfection with unrivaled Nelson Sauvin hops conveying aromatic notes of mango pineapple white grapes and black pepper Your taste buds will celebrate its crisp dry and refreshing finish balanced by light bitterness and touch of bready malt character Make every day Brütiful
An extra dry India Pale Ale brewed with Galaxy hops
Brut IPA hopped with Galaxy Juicy aromatic and bone dry
A dry IPA featuring Amarillo and Citra hops
Collaboration with Fort George Brewing

Our first iteration of Brut IPA Employing an enzyme to assist neutral ale strain in fermenting all available sugar in the wort this IPA is bone dry yet incredibly drinkable and hopped with Mosaic Citra Azacca Carbonated high for an effervescent refreshing enjoyment

Ten Tickles is Brut IPA brewed with blackberry blueberry and lemon Deep pink in color with slightly pink head carrying aromas of tart berry and dank citrus Fruity flavors shine in this beer Leading with slight tartness before blending with grapefruit citrus and jam like berry this medium bodied beer has lively carbonation making the flavors pop before finishing dry How many tickles does it take to make an Octopus laugh IBU

A Juicy Brut IPA packed with notes of pineapple orange peach and mango just in time for Spring Two worlds collide with this Brut style IPA that meets juicy New England This bright and bubbly beer exhibits notes of pineapple mango juice candied peach and orange compote The dry body acts as the perfect backdrop for these juicy hops to mellow out with the bright effervescence
Brut IPA with Galaxy Simcoe and Ekuanot hops

We took all the best bits of New England IPA and Brut IPA and mashed it up into one incredible beer Enjoy the juicy hoppy deliciousness of Mosaic Simcoe and Columbus hops without all the bitterness The crisp bone dry finish will have you craving that next sip

We brewed the ultimate beverage for the bro or sis that isn into sweet bubbles served in pretentious highfalutin glassware BroMosa is dry hopped juicy IPA with name that makes it socially acceptable to drink in the morning or any time of day Expect strong punch of tangerine flavor followed by dry and hoppy finish that even the self proclaimed IPA hater enjoys Made with Champagne yeast
Collaboration with Ascension Brewing Company
India pale ale inspired ale brewed with Mosaic hop lupulin powder

Our ART SERIES has evolved to feature photography submitted by our Instagram fans The first winner our contest is Anthony Drake southern California based outdoor and lifestyle photographer Anthony stunning photo of the night sky over the beach is the inspiration for Cosmic Ocean Cosmic Ocean is single hop Brut IPA Mosaic hops give the beer bright grapefruit and pineapple notes bolstered by slight coconut flavor from the addition of toasted rice flakes True to brut fashion Cosmic Ocean finishes bone dry with an effervescent and refreshing finish Cosmic Ocean is the first in series of four beers in the Art Series We re proud to be supporting emerging artists whose roots perfectly align with our stay coastal lifestyle Food Pairings Cheese Steak Flat Iron Jambalaya Pasta
Made with white grapes dry hopped to perfection and carbonated to make it bubbly this Brut IPA is one of kind champagne of beers
Our take on the enigmatic style of Brut IPA Full bodied with crisp bone dry finish Mecca Grade malt raw spelt citra centennial and motueka hops

Our India Pale Ale recalls time when ales shipped from England to India were highly hopped to preserve their distinct taste during the long journey The result is hop lover dream with fruity aroma set off by dry malt middle and long hop finish IBUs

We started brewing this beer as summer seasonal in There were some great IPAs out in the Pacific Northwest but no local IPAs on the east coast We wanted to have local IPA so we brewed one People absolutely loved it and so did we So we made it year round beer and it now our bestselling beer and our flagship Since its introduction Harpoon IPA has remained unique in its ability to balance hop bitterness with strong malt backbone Dry hopped with Cascade hops it has floral hop aroma and finish that is bitter it is an IPA after all without being harsh or astringent Combined with malty sweetness and the fruity esters of our proprietary yeast those hops create beer that is wonderfully hoppy but clean and refreshing enough to enjoy few of and we hope you do IBU
A medium bodied and well hopped India pale ale with dry fruity finish Named in honor of the hero of the Battle of Lake Erie during the War of Don Give Up the Sip

Plenty of IPAs will promise you the moon and the stars looking to seduce you with words of smashing bitterness and hops everlasting Actually we re not here to blow you away with lupulin cannon or peel the enamel off your teeth East IPA is clean drinkable IPA that packed with flavor and offers bold balance not smack in the head American hops soar in the bright piney aroma while East Kent Goldings hops bring the taste of stone fruits and firm bitterness from IPA ancestral British home Give our East IPA try with some rich crab cakes or salmon strike up conversation with farmhouse cheddars and find harmony alongside spicy dishes East IPA blend of tradition and exuberance sets the standard for hop driven deliciousness

Formerly known as Brutal IPA Brutal Bitter Ale and Portland State IPA An Imperial bitter with exotic traditional floor malts citrusy hoppy flavor and stupendous hop aroma Rogue brewmaster John Maier describes his Brutal IPA as cross between Very Extra Special Bitter and an Indian Pale Ale Hedonistic INGREDIENTS Row Carawheat C Rogue Farms Dare Risk Malts Rogue Farms Alluvial Hops Free Range Coastal Water Pacman Yeast Plato IBU AA Lovibond

A throwback historical ale brewed when English IPA were hopped up to last the long voyage from England to Colonial troops in India using English malts English hops English yeast and aged slightly on toasted oak for th century taste IBU

An ale of enlightenment created to aid in deciphering the puzzles along life road and to interpret signs in the voyages of the spirit Blind Faith is an extremely well balanced India Pale Ale with crisp refreshing hop bitterness and deep malt body to match IBU

Real India Pale Ale IPA as it was first brewed in the days of the British Empire was not the carefully filtered brew that we call IPA beer today The first IPAs were unfiltered and featured extra hops and higher strength as preservative for the long trip from England to the colony of India Our Traditional IPA ale is naturally carbonated dry hopped unfiltered like the old days IBU
Fuggles is single hopped dry crisp ale that is wonderfully balanced and deceptively smooth

The Hopfish brilliant little thing Catch one and reminisce about the classic days of IPAs fortified by multiple additions of hops and balanced with the residual sweetness of caramel malts The Hopfish is always ready to take on the harsh conditions of the even changing beer world

Made in Dublin Ireland at St James Gate Guinness Nitro IPA is brewed with Irish barley malt touch of roasted barley and five hop varieties Admiral Celeia Topaz Challenger and Cascade The Challenger Cascade and Topaz hops are dry hopped to accentuate sharp citrus aroma The beer blend of CO and Nitrogen helps to balance out the profusion of hop flavors while also creating the signature surge and settle made famous by Guinness Draught The IPA is brewed with the same unique Guinness yeast strain used to ferment all stouts at St James Gate

You don need compass to find your way to our flagship India Pale Ale This classic British inspired IPA boasts well rounded malt profile complex floral and citrus aromas and generous Goldings dry hopping Well balanced between malt sweetness and hop bitterness

Dry hopped with Columbus hops in our open fermenters our IPA boasts bright floral aroma and flavor reminiscent of pine and lemon peel The pronounced hop bitterness is balanced by medium bodied caramel and biscuity malt character with nutty finish It showcases many subtle earthy bitter notes rather than the resinous citrus rind bite often featured in many American style IPA OG IBU

Generous quantities of Simcoe and Glacier hops are added throughout the boil Then late in fermentation we infuse the Sweet Child with another dose of Glaciers imparting bouquet of hop aroma that veritably bursts forth upon serving ABV IBUs Plato SRM

Green Man India Pale Ale is delectably hoppy with properly balanced body Generous hop additions give it wonderful bitterness and pleasant floral nose while our combination of traditional British malts creates rich satisfying flavor and alluring copper color This authentic English style IPA is our flagship ale

Hitachino Japanese Classic Ale is brewed following the original India Pale Ale brought to Japan in the th century It is slowly matured in Cedar casks which are commonly used in the brewing of traditional Japanese sake

Named after one of the famous front four trails on Mt Mansfield this P is brewed in the English tradition of pale ales shipped from Britain around Africa to India Those ales contained extra hops and higher alcohol percentage which both served as natural preservatives This ale holds true to those original defining characteristics Formerly known as National IPA at The Shed Restaurant Brewery

Our Naughty Oaked IPA was inspired by ocean bound oak barreled brews of the Packed with hops on minute schedule uniquely malted then aged on bed of oak this IPA delivers taste that is both innovative and timeless IBU

An English style IPA Hop on or Die is heavy handed on the hoppy bitterness just enough to balance out the florals resulting in smooth copper toned beer This isn an over hopped West Coast style IPA hiding poor quality with palate wrecking quantity of hops it is smooth delicate and well balanced

This ale is traditionally highly hopped and robust to survive the long voyage to the Indian sub continent The result is full bodied Pale Ale with zesty character Dark golden in colour pleasing toffee aromas and distinctive floral citrus flavours
IBU

With the amount of IPAs brewed here in the States you think that there only one way to skin cat While the West Coast style has long dominated the style there a world of IPAs you should explore and Blitzkrieg Hops DIPA wouldn be bad start Blitzkrieg is big ABV juicy earthy hopped English style double IPA brewed entirely with English malts hops and fermented with an English ale yeast strain Brewed with Maris Otter pale malt and hopped with Admiral Pilgrim Phoenix and Target hops all big juicy high alpha English hops that we thought needed lil love each of which is over alpha acid Blitzkrieg Hops DIPA is our homage to the birthplace of the IPA as well as the band that inspired its name OG FG IBU SRM Base Malt Maris Otter

Fashioned after the famous ales from Burton On Trent which took on such bold character after surviving the long rolling voyage from London to Calcutta in the days of the Empire This is an amber colored masterpiece in the world of beer styles
The copper color of this India Pale Ale hints at the strong malt character needed to support the huge hoppy flavors and defining bitterness of this classic beer
ABV in bottles and in cask
This India Pale Ale is an oldie but goodie Floral and piney hops rise from crisp nose with strong notes of caramunich and caramel malts The perfect pairing for any meal IBU

Hops and Robbers was formulated with two great friends who share passion for Craft beer conversation stealth missions Finding great beer on tap and travel Nathan and Claude have always been looking for the next big score for IPA so we decided to produce our own beer for the local market that had great balance aroma and IBU This is golden IPA with an exceptionally rich and complex character Fruity aromas of lemon with hints of pineapple combine crisply with toasty caramel flavours and tasty malt backbone Dry hopping with cascade hops ensures more hop aromatics are retained in the finished beer Made with pride and panache Double Trouble Brewing flagship brand Hops Robbers is refreshingly delicious

McAuslan presents its New World take on the classic IPAs of the th century England In those days the beers was brewed extra strong and generously hopped to help it survive the long journey to India Inspired by that history and today blod American IPAs we ve married Cascade and Chinook hops with subtle blend of malts anyone who appreciates strong ale will love it Hop bitterness and malt smoothness it a journey your taste buds will enjoy time and again
An award winning modern India Pale Ale packed full of citrus pineapple and grapefruit resinous flavours with fine crisp bitter finish On cask at bottled and canned at on keg at and exported in keg at

Dead Elephant is full bodied golden pale ale that pours with linen white medium density head leaving spider web lace on the glass On the palate the flavour is sweet and fruity malts up front apricot mango with bit of candy and slight grassy notes that fall away to reveal hint of biscuit with rather pleasant grapefruit and perfume undertones To the nose there is mild malt aroma that accentuates the robust floral bouquet derived from the hops

Crafted to produce an authentic re creation of an IPA With its pale appearance strong hoppy taste and higher alcoholic strength it comprises all the genuine characteristics of true India Pale Ale which were necessary to survive the three month long journey from Burton to Bombay abv

Esquire Magazine calls our Minute IPA perhaps the best IPA in America An imperial IPA best savored from snifter Minute has great malt backbone that stands up to the extreme hopping rate Minute IPA was the first beer we continuously hopped allowing for pungent but not crushing hop flavor IBU

Pliny the Elder is brewed with Amarillo Centennial CTZ and Simcoe hops It is well balanced with malt hops and alcohol slightly bitter with fresh hop aroma of floral citrus and pine Best enjoyed FRESH That is why we make it in such limited supply Actual bottling date is printed on each bottle

Starting with six different hop varietals added to the brew kettle culminating with massive dry hop addition of Simcoe hops Bell Hopslam Ale possesses the most complex hopping schedule in the Bell repertoire Selected specifically because of their aromatic qualities these Pacific Northwest varieties contribute pungent blend of grapefruit stone fruit and floral notes generous malt bill and solid dollop of honey provide just enough body to keep the balance in check resulting in remarkably drinkable rendition of the Double India Pale Ale style

Listing for all Stone Enjoy By xx xx xx IPA beers http www stonebrewing com enjoyby You have in your hands devastatingly fresh double IPA While freshness is key component of many beers especially big citrusy floral IPAs we ve taken it further lot further in this IPA You see we specifically brewed it NOT to last We ve not only gone to extensive lengths to ensure that you re getting this beer in your hands within an extraordinarily short window we made sure that the Enjoy By date isn randomly etched in tiny text somewhere on the label to be overlooked by all but the most attentive of retailers and consumers Instead we ve sent clear message with the name of the beer itself that there is no better time than right now to enjoy this IPA

This sad holiday season we didn have the brewing capacity to make our favorite seasonal brew the widely feared BrownShugga Ale You see we had couple of really good years thank you very much and so heading into this season while we are awaiting the January delivery of new brewhouse we are jammin along brewing barrels of IPA and PILS and such every hours couple of months back we realized that since we can only brew mere barrels of Shugga every hours that we were seriously screwed For every case of Shugga brewed we short cases of our favorite daily beers It a drag This year we brewed something that we think is also cool and brews more like our daily brews The new brewhouse will help insure this kind of failure never happens again It a mess that we can not brew our BrownShugga this year and we suck for not doing it There is nothing cool about screwing this up this badly and we know it Maybe we can sue our own sorry selves There is no joy in our hearts this holiday and the best we can hope for is quick and merciful end us This totally blows Whatever We freaking munch moldy donkey butt and we just want it to be all over So this substitute beer is Cereal Medley of Barley Rye Wheat and Oats Full of complexishness from the grains and weighing in at abv Then joyously dry hopped for that big aroma and resinous hop flavor

Too extreme to be called beer Minute IPA is brewed to colossal degree plato boiled for full two hours while being continuously hopped with high alpha American hops then dry hopped daily in the fermenter for month and aged for another month on whole leaf hops IBUABV varies from

As craft beer pioneers we embarked on an expedition to brew the benchmark West Coast IPA We ventured into the unknown and struck gold discovering tantalizing menagerie of hops Simcoe for tropical and grapefruit zest Columbus for hop pungency Centennial for pine notes Citra for citrus zest and Cascade for floral aroma are layered throughout the brewing process West Coast IPA exemplifies the Green Flash spirit of adventure and discovery IBUPrior to ABV and later ABV

Clean this mess up or else we ll all end up in jail those test tubes and the scale just get em all outta here He was referring to the complex super critical CO hop extraction equipment set up on the table in the lab across from the brewhouse Hop extracts are for the BIG brewers he thought suitable only for crummy sub standard and barely passable industrial lagers not the subtle and elegant craft beer made here But wrong he was The New Brewer does not eschew any possible inputs In this case the mountain of extracts will replace the mountain of hop vegetative material in the kettle thus creating cleaner hop flavors and preventing the otherwise spinach like mess of kettle full of super hopped wort from clogging up pump or worse The sensuous honey like amber ooze was administered intravenously to the wort kettle and the sacrament was complete Another kettle of Hop Stoopid is once again raised up and fermented on high

A dangerously drinkable Double IPA Double Jack opens up with bright grapefruit and tangerine American hop aromas Beautifully crafted undertones of stone fruit are revealed upon first sip followed by the essence of blue basil and pine sturdy pale and crystal malt backbone brings balance to high hop intensity Complex and aggressively hopped and flawlessly balanced

This oak aged gentle giant has been gaining popularity over the past few years and is now available year round For Burton Baton we brew two threads or batches of beer an English style old ale and an imperial IPA After fementating the beers separately in our stainless tanks they re transferred and blended together in one of our large oak tanks Burton Baton sits on the wood for about month When enjoying the Burton Baton you ll find an awesome blend of the citrus notes from Northwestern hops melding with woody vanilla notes from the oak The wood also tends to mellow the ABV of Burton so tread cautiously IBU
An imperial IPA that was brewed to turn your world upside down Hops will get you coming and going Pungent aromatics up front pair with malt balanced backbone and smooth bitter finish IBU

A whole cone hurricane of flavor Our brewers selected the finest most flavorful hops pushed them beyond their limits and forged them into this all new triple IPA This reimagined Hoptimum is our hoppiest beer yet providing blend of tropical and citrus hop aroma that delivers refined yet aggressive character IBU YEAST Ale yeastBITTERING HOPS Crystal EkuanotFINISHING HOPS Strata Simcoe Citra Mosaic LoralMALTS Two row Pale Wheat Flaked Oats
An Imperial India Pale Ale with an intense citrus hop aroma huge malt body and crisp finish IBU

This lupulin ladin India Pale Ale is packed with juicy tropical fruit character bright floral aromas and delectable layers of hop flavor Pour mindfully inhale deeply and enjoy tropical vacation in glass Always store cold enjoy fresh and stay cool Sip of Sunshine IPA is brewed by Lawson Finest Liquids at Two Roads Brewing Co in Stratford CT

Maharaja is derived from the sanskrit words mahat meaning great and rajan meaning king Much like its namesake this imperial IPA is regal intense and mighty With hops and malts as his servants he rules both with heavy hand The Maharaja flaunts his authority over deranged amount of hops tangy vibrant and pungent along with an insane amount of malted barley fashioning dark amber hue and exquisite malt essence Welcome to his kingdom The Maharaja is the second installment in our Dictator Series IBUsABV varies slightly batch to batch
Triple IPA Dry hopped for twenty six days straight with combination of hop varieties actual IBU although it calculates to over

We remember our first sip of hoppy beer do you Nearly spit that out Now we fantasize about this stuff Thinking about those hop ones bursting with juice ripe as all hell makes you look forward to that first RESIN all day long Can wait Key Ingredients Chinook and Centennial Hops are little old school with tons of resin and pine notes RESIN uses ton of different hops for massively complex hop bouquet

Hazy gold in color this Oatmeal Double IPA has aggressive aromas of candied grapefruit tangerine and tropical fruit Malted oats greatly enhance the body and the high level of bitterness is balanced by this sweetness Citra hops are used for aroma flavor additions and for dry hopping while Warrior hops are used primarily for bitterness OG PlatoColor SRMHops Citra WarriorYeast English AleMalt row Golden Naked OatsABV

Hercules Double IPA is not for the faint of heart It is however fit for the gods Hercules delivers huge amount of hops from start to finish Its hefty backbone of nutty malty sweetness balances its aggressive hop profile Australian International Beer Awards Gold Medal Imperial IPA Australian International Beer Awards Silver Medal Imperial IPA Australian International Beer Awards Silver Medal Imperial IPA BeerAdvocate Top Beers On Planet Earth

At Tröegs artisanal meets mechanical in state of IPA we call Perpetual Cycling through our HopBack vessel and dry hopping method this bold Imperial Pale Ale emerges rife with sticky citrus rind pine balm and tropical fruit

So mega hopped it will take you to hop heaven We ve used hops in the boil more hops in the giant hopback and added to that an incredible amount of dry hopping for that cutting edge hop bite Once you ve tasted this unique beer all others pale in comparison OG Classified IBU
A massive IPA that will leave your palate its hapless victim Scorched earth is our brewery policy IBU
Formerly known as Alchemy Hour Double IPA Inspired by the North Coast dedicated and sometimes chilly surf community our Double IPA will melt the ice in your beard and never lose its balance

Pliny the Younger the man was Pliny the Elder nephew and adopted son They lived nearly years ago Pliny the Elder is our Double IPA so we felt it was fitting to name our Triple IPA after his son It is almost true Triple IPA with triple the amount of hops as regular P That said it is extremely difficult time and space consuming and very expensive to make And that is why we don make it more often This beer is very full bodied with tons of hop character in the nose and throughout It is also deceptively well balanced and smooth
The wolf inside this pale ale is trying to walk upright This bright and aromatic beer was brewed with our friends in the band Pig Destroyer IBU

Named for Myrcene component of essential oils in the hop flower Myrcenary Double IPA is our tribute to those who revere the illustrious hop and their unyielding exploit to craft hop forward beers Brewed with blend of hops containing the highest levels of Myrcene this double IPA prevails with tropical fruit like flavor pungent floral aroma and clean getaway IBUs

Gubna was bred from Oskar Blues Brewery hankering to confront IBUs by cranking up the complexity of hops by pouring Cascade on top of copious amounts of Summit then balancing that with backbone of German Dark Munich Malt and Rye Malt GUBNA post fermentation dry hopping with both hops allows this monstrosity to gently coax the citrus rind and grapefruit aroma while providing rye malt induced spicy yet round middle and brisk clean bitter finish percent ABV IBUs

Have you read the description for the regular Crooked Tree yet Well this beer is almost the same just double the flavor and alcohol We actually took the Crooked Tree recipe and doubled all of the ingredients except the water just the way DOUBLE should be made Big hops balanced with tons of malt give this beer huge body Although this beer is as cool as The Fonz when first purchased it gets really mellow and smooth with some age After year or two stored in cool dark place you ll notice the heavy caramel and malt flavors are trying to sneak past the hops This beer is hugely delicious so it will need your undivided attention the chores can wait trust us IBUs

Our take on the West Coast style Double India Pale Ale The Oracle places hop intensity first and foremost making only the slightest concession to malt and balance The fireworks start with the aromatic punch of dry hop sessions with hop varieties from the Pacific Northwest Resinous citrusy hop flavors mixed with aggressive bitterness from massive kettle addition deliver on that aromatic promise

Ninja vs Unicorn celebrates the epic battle between two of the biggest hop heads of lore Brewed with over five pounds of hops per barrel this unfiltered double IPA is sure to please the most discerning hop lover Whether you re rooting for the mythical horned horse or the deadly assassin of the east we hope you ll enjoy Ninja vs Unicorn

Named for South Bay Bessie the legendary Lake Erie cryptid Lake Erie Monster has legend of its own longtime pub exclusive beer our Imperial IPA quickly earned cult following for its unprecedented hoppiness Today we feed the beast whole leaf Simcoe hops in the whirlpool and hopback for monstrous load of bitterness and aroma MALTS Harrington Row Caramel HOPS Simcoe Willamette IBU

he mountains of Summit and Nugget hops in this high gravity Imperial will thrill even the most experienced beer explorer Savory evergreen and pineapple aromas mingle with flavors of bitter resinous pine and grapefruit pith colossal rush of hoppy adventure

Our first Double IPA dry refreshing and hoppy We really focused on hop flavor and aroma here To maximize hop character we dry hopped Dinner twice with over lbs of hops per barrel For the best experience please enjoy fresh as possible

Once our eyes were opened to the potential of the hop cone we couldn be stopped With laser focus we magnified the hop factor and pushed the boundaries of flavor aroma and perception itself to create HI RES It Mad Science

With an immense hop flavor and bitter finish this monumental IPA is an enigma worth pondering see what we did there Centennial Chinook Cascade and Galaxy hops come together to create hop sanctuary Revere the almighty hop This is their new version of Hop Henge Imperial IPA the hops have been modified as of IBU
This American double India pale ale is packed with juicy tropical fruit flavors and bright herbal aromas thanks to the abundance of US grown hops

Also known as Ruination in Europe Liquid Poem to the Glory of the HopFirst Release April Stone Ruination IPA was the first full time brewed and bottled West Coast double IPA on the planet As craft beer has evolved over the years so too have techniques for maximizing hop flavors and aromas For the second incarnation of our groundbreaking India pale ale we employed dry hopping and hop bursting to squeeze every last drop of piney citrusy tropical essence from the hops that give this beer its incredible character We ve also updated the name to Stone Ruination Double IPA to reflect the imperial level intensity that evident in every sip Join us in cheering this the second stanza in our Liquid Poem to the Glory of the Hop

Fully juicy in its citrus character with the pleasantly sharp biting edges of tart fruit and bitterness Hop Ranch Imperial India Pale Ale traces its roots to Victory Ranch series unique and comprehensive study of hops in which Brewmasters experimented with different hop varieties to showcase range of flavor profiles and celebrate the nuances and distinctions in the resulting series recipes Mosaic hops and Hop Azacca

In the Waldos met one afteroon at in the front courtyard of their school near the statue of Louis Pasteur They set out in Impala armed with treasure map on journey to find secret garden near Point Reyes They met there at the same time every day and continued their quest They never found the secret garden But they keep lookin The dankest and hoppiest beer ever brewed at Lagunitas was made with help of the Waldos for all treasure hunters IBU

The magical hops cast their spell the natives chant and the drums beat First let us conﬁrm that there is no witchcraft used in creating this ﬁne brew None Really Well maybe little supernatural beer with powerhouse of hops creating aromas and ﬂavors of citrus pine and tropical fruit with juicy resiny hop finish Hakuna Matata

is small batch limited edition ale that was created by our Brewmaster to separate the weak from the strong is double IPA that combines Pale Munich Caramel Carapils and Torrified Wheat malts with Chinook Centennial Simcoe and Fuggles hops It has big sweet mouthfeel followed by more hoppiness than you ve ever had at one time Enjoy
Our flagship Double IPA Mongo harnesses the flavor of Columbus Cascade Centennial and Simcoe hops Massive resinous aroma leads to citrus notes with piney bitterness on the finish IBU

Heddy Topper is an American Double India Pale Ale This beer is not intended to be the biggest or most bitter It is meant to give you wave after wave of hoppy goodness on your palate Tremendous amounts of American hops will creep up on you and leave you with dense hoppy finish in you mouth So drinkable it scary Sometimes wish could crawl right into the can Freshness and control have always been my main concern when it comes to our beer We are committed to providing you with an unfiltered and unpasteurized hop experience Why do recommend that you drink it from the can Quite simply to ensure delightful hop experience The act of pouring it in glass smells nice but it releases the essential hop aromas that we have work so hard to retain If you MUST pour it into glass you may find that some of the hop resins have settled to the bottom leave them in the can while pouring This beer is perishable and at its best when it is young fresh and hazy Keep it cold but not ice cold Drink this beer immediately we are always making more John Kimmich IBU
Bursting with oz per gallon of American hops Julius is loaded with notes of passionfruit mango and citrus At alcohol it is refreshing and freakishly drinkable

Focal Banger is an American India Pale Ale We have real love for IPAs here at The Alchemist and we strive to offer you the best hop experience that we possibly can The beer is brewed using Citra and Mosaic hops and our favorite British malts Truly an abundance of malty goodness Freshness and control have always been my main concern when it comes to our beer We are committed to providing you with an unfiltered and unpasteurized hop experience Why do recommend that you drink it from can Quite simply to ensure delightful hop experience The act of pouring it in glass smells nice but it releases the essential hop aromas that we have worked so hard to retain If you MUST pour it into glass you may find that some of the hop resins have settled to the bottom leave them in the can when pouring This beer is perishable and at its best when it is young fresh and hazy Keep it cold but not ice cold Drink this beer today you could be dead tomorrow John Kimmich

Our cross continental IPA Made with Australian and American hops this citrus heavy IPA opens up in the glass with notes of pineapple tangerine and orange rind It sharply bitter and nearly ABV The name comes from the initial batch in which post boil the wort looked green from so much hop particulate floating around Yes Yes Yes Yes

Long live the King King Sue that is Her ferocious bite will make sure all newcomers learn to toe the line And what better way to exude her influence than with this Citra hopped double IPA Followers will cheer Enemies will crumble But don take her lightly because when this double IPA is on rampage nothing will stand in her way IBUABV varies with each batch

We constructed this beer around hops we currently have plenty of access to allowing us to re brew it on relatively consistent basis We smell ton of orange on the nose with complimentary notes of peach and passionfruit The flavor is similar with blast of citrus fruit orange quickly followed by spicy grapefruit and earthy dankness lingering but pleasant hop oil finish awaits

A beer brewed in the spirit of experimentation and the celebration of our rd anniversary What we did here is we took whole bunch of Mosaic and Amarillo hops classic punch of citrus purveying goodness and added them to the Julius dry hop The base beer is exactly the same but the dry hop is altered tremendously The result is beer with all the deliciousness of the base beer with layer of added citrusy complexity Like devil Julius or something real treat

The holiday season has way of stirring up nostalgia In late we brewed King Julius on our original Brew Magic brewing system whole ten gallons of it Despite the size of the batch the memory of it is enormous in our hearts The thought of it brings us back to our cozy Brimfield barn with the wood stove cranking the record player spinning Santa Dean mulling about and Lauren and Kim filling growlers out of modified chest freezer in small nook under wooden staircase As we continue to move forward in our journey it felt like the perfect time to pay homage to our beginnings King Julius is our endeavor to marry our past with what we aspire to be in the future King Julius is an American Double IPA brewed to be an exceptionally flavorful juicy and hop saturated beer while never tiring the palate It vivid citrus aromas give way to flavors of orange creamsicle mango smoothie and bounty of fresh tropical fruit We find it to be supremely soft in the midst of an onslaught of flavor beer we are quite proud of
