Our interpretation of classic English beer style is copper colored medium bodied and pleasantly hopped Its flavor is delightfully complex tangy fruit at the start with an assertive hop crispness and long malty palate that one well known beer writer has compared to the flavor of freshly baked bread IBU

This American pale ale opens with big citrus and pine notes then smooths out with faint toasted malt character and dry slightly bitter finish Denver Pale Ale is your go to beer from city to trail and back again no matter what the time or season

Whale Tale Pale Ale is an English style pale ale named in honor of Nantucket whaling history Wonderfully balanced with Maris Otter malt hints of crystal malt and generously hopped with East Kent Goldings it has rich honey color and fruity hop aroma IBU

A pioneer in craft beer hey that rhymes Summit Extra Pale Ale has been gracing the pint glasses of serious beer lovers since Bronze color Gold medal winning flavor Featuring caramel biscuity malts balanced by an earthy hop bite and juicy citrus

Draught Bottle Another fine addition to the Black Sheep flock of premium bottle ales This ale was specially commissioned to commemorate the th anniversary of Monty Python in Ten years later on the th anniversary Holy Grail is still going strong With more hops than killer rabbit it a full flavoured golden ale with distinctively fruity flavour followed by the Black Sheep signature dry finish We brew Holy Grail with Maris Otter malt an old and expensive variety that is renowned for the taste and the quality of the beer it produces mixture of old English Hop varieties including touch of WGV hops gives Holy Grail its lovely fruity nose We use touch of wheat which helps deliver the lovely creamy head and lacing down the glass just what you would expect from proper Yorkshire beer

One of our heritage beers Yuengling Lord Chesterfield Ale has as much rich heritage as it does flavor and appeal Crafted in unique two stage European brewing style for enhanced bitterness it utilizes both conventional kettle hopping and dry hopping after fermentation resulting in dry sharp finish Its distinct robust flavor is derived from delicate combination of sweet maltiness and lingering herbal bitterness

The distinctive hop character of our Barrel Pale Ale is due to the extraction of essential oils from select hops We treat Barrel Pale Ale to an infusion of fresh whole hop flowers in the Hop Back and the Fermentor as well as four hop additions during the kettle boil We like how this gives the beer fresh lively flavor and aroma

Our flagship Pale Ale is smooth balanced copper colored session beer with mildly spiced flavor and aroma from the East Kent Goldings hops The bready lightly caramel malt complements the hint of fruitiness contributed by the London Ale yeast making it satisfying and authentic the perfect flagship beer for Schlafly Sixteenth century brewers created amber beers by using form of coal called coke to roast their grains Coke burns hotter and more steadily than wood without imparting the foul odors from coal It allowed brewers to produce caramel malts that were paler alternatives to the common brown porters At about the same time Flemish migrants introduced hops to English beers and soon this ale became the chosen style of England from the mid th century until the end of the th century Today brewers outside England have adopted the Pale Ale and made it one of the leading styles of the American craft beer movement IBU

Little has changed since Thomas Cooper brewed his first batch of Sparkling Ale in It still naturally conditioned in the bottle with our unique strain of Coopers yeast To enjoy the complete Sparkling experience roll the bottle to mix in the yeast sediment before pouring No additives No preservatives

Our Pale is naturally conditioned in the bottle or keg This traditional Coopers brewing method produces the trademark sediment that gives our ales distinctive fine cloudy appearance This beer is deep golden colour and pours with generous level of foam To unlock its full flavour potential make sure to roll before pouring No additives No preservatives

The drinkers favourite classic pale ale with complex citrus and hoppy aroma recent survey revealed that Landlord has the highest proportion of drinkers who call it their favourite ale And it has won more awards than any other beer winning both CAMRA Champion Beer of Britain and the Brewing Industry Challenge Cup four times The ABV in bottle is

Our flagship This is classic British pale ale with nod to the legendary beers of Burton on Trent Copper colored dry clean and crisp with lots of late hop taste in an appetizing complex with ale fruitiness from imported Hampshire yeast Original gravity alcohol by volume two row English malt pale crystal and chocolate Cascade Mt Hood Tettnang and Fuggle Hops

Traditional English style pale ale with our own East Coast twist UK Fuggles and Goldings dominate the flavor of Powder Monkey but has subtle notes of citrus and flower from Cascade hops added in the boil and hopback Brass in color Powder Monkey like all of our beers is well balanced distinct bitterness and slight malt sweetness characterize the taste In it won bronze medal at the World Beer Cup in it won silver medal at the Great American Beer Festival

Our Master Brewers describe Kentucky Ale as marriage between two classic beer styles Irish Red Ale and English Pale Ale Light amber in color Kentucky Ale owes its unique body and character to select imported malts and pinch of wheat malt for rich smooth taste The unique body and character of Kentucky Ale is heavily influenced by the water drawn from aquifers in the limestone rock underlying the Bluegrass Region of Kentucky

his strikingly authentic English style pale ale is brewed with all English malts and pound and half of Pacific Northwest hops per barrel It is medium bodied crisp and well balanced with flavor profile featuring subtle notes of caramel toffee and toasted malt counterbalanced by the ideal level of hop bitterness The delicate herbal hop finish is produced by Goldings whole leaf hops OG IBU
Our first brew back in the early the original pale ale with perfectly balanced hops malts creating super drinkability

There something about warm summer day that calls out for cold glass of great beer and this classic Czech style lager is sure to fit the bill Crisp golden and refreshing Summerfest is the perfect choice for soaking up the sunshine Summerfest is Czech style lager featuring slight malt sweetness spicy hop flavor and the crisp finish you want on hot summer day

While most lagers give away most of their taste profile in the front of the mouth Pilsner Urquell only hints at its flavour there Instead it develops in the middle followed by refreshing clean finish and balanced aftertaste practically inviting you to have another

Mama Little Yella Pils Our upcoming new canned good is small batch version of the beer that made Pilsen Czechoslovakia famous Mama is made with hearty amounts of pale malt German specialty malts and blend of traditional Saaz and st century Bavarian hops Our first canned lager it also fermented at cool temperatures with German yeast This tasteful reality Czech is the perfect antidote for the watered down versions of pilsner clogging Americaâ shelves And Mama gentle hopping about IBUs and low ABV just mean we re finally honoring consumer requests for delicious but less challenging beer Hey we like good low dose session beer too Look for our Gold Metal Winner on US shelves in March Sadly the Feds rejected our Take Two and Call Us in the Morning line on the can

Our only Lager brewed with loads of imported Saaz hops and bottom fermenting yeast strain that leaves it Light and Crisp and Easy to Slam yet full of real flavor and all the things you yearn for Like Adam and Eve Isaac and Ishmael Mao and Confucius Good and Evil Day and Night Hittites and Visigoths John and Lorena or Groucho and Moe Ales and Lagers are as different as can be Still we must love each for who they are separately but equally with liberty and justice for all Cheers

Exported to the US as Czechvar Our premium pale lager is beer for real connoisseurs The first class female cones of top quality Saaz hops pure clean natural water from metre deep artesian wells and carefully selected grains of unique cultivar of Moravian barely make the premium lager drink for real beer experts year long tradition of brewing the original Beer from Budweis and unique day long maturing period amplify the beer exceptionality even more Budweiser Budvar Premium Pale Lager can thus be savoured with all the senses Firstly your eye can see its beautiful golden colour and rich thick head then you can smell its mild hop aroma and feel the misted glass in your palm and finally use your taste buds to savour its mild medium strong bitterness Our premium pale lager will forever impress in your mind

A Perry Pils hybrid Piercing Pils is Czech Style Pilsner brewed with White Pear Tea and Pear juice Both the juice and the tea were added in the kettle during the whirlpool after the boil for maximum flavor and aroma contribution The Pear fruit complexity pierces right through the spicy Czech Saaz hops beautifully adding gentle acidity to this pale lager that makes for crisp refreshing sipper Amarillo hops add nuanced citrus notes that meld perfectly with the fruit
Following in the tradition of Czech Pilsners by offering combination of firm malt and herbal hop bitterness Bell Lager of the Lakes is as refreshing and crisp as swim in the Great Lakes
A golden pheasant in field of ripened barley has always been sign of rich and bountiful harvest

Torch PilsnerA well structured Czech style pilsner Torch is strong in alcohol with rich full finish Good mouth feel and well balanced Czech Saaz hops ensure that Torch is not your typical pilsner Alcohol by Volume ABV Color SRM Bitterness IBUs Torch Pilsner bgAVAILABILITYYear round

We believe that world class results require focus and dedication so we developed distinctive recipe for our single brand based on Europe renowned brewing standards yet is brewed fresh locally at our independent Canadian Brewery We use traditional brewing techniques and only four natural ingredients including spring water malted barley hops and yeast all GMO free There is fifth ingredient in every refreshing bottle and that is the passion of our dedicated Brewmaster and staff

Unpasteurized Belgian PilsnerBavik Super Pils obtains its unique taste and aroma from its exceptional brewing process Our pilsner has not been diluted we only use aroma hops guarantee long and cold maturation process and pasteurization is out of the question Those four elements result in this unique pilsner Never compromise on taste

Fresh Cut is sensory experience It conjures impressions of freshly chopped ingredients newly mowed lawn or the air after cooling rain This pale lager delivers captivating notes of fruit grass and spice highlighted by the luscious Chinook hop The beer finishes crisp dry and refreshing helping to enhance the colorful flavors up front Obviously we re crazy about this beer and had to use thesaurus to express our feelings about it Fresh Cut is dry hopped pilsner Chinook Citra and Centennial hops provide aromas of citrus grass and spice Though the front palate is loud with IPA qualities the finish is distinctly pilsner crisp dry and extremely refreshing Enjoy SUGGESTED FOOD PAIRINGS Fish Sandwiches Lobsters and meals eaten on rustic outdoors single origin hand hewn Amish furniture IBU

This aromatic lager features sunshine hue herbal noble hop nose and dry finish We balance pilsner malt with blend of European hops and polish it with extended periods of cold conditioning You re royalty now drink like it

STS Pils is classic European style Pilsner It is straw in color and often times will have slight haze due to the fact that it is unfiltered STS Pils is hop forward pilsner with mild malt foundation strong lager yeast characteristic and dry bitter finish

Czech Pilsner is crisp golden highly hopped lager This style beer was first brewed in Pilsen Czechoslovakia in using sample of special yeast smuggled from Germany by Czech monk Until this time all beers were dark and cloudy The new Czech Pilsner was the first beer to be brewed clear and golden IBU
The lager is the lightest most refreshing of our beers It a classic Bavarian style lager with delicious bready malt palate and an assertive noble hop finish It just makes your mouth beg for more

Styled after the Bohemian classic Pilz is crisp golden pilsner with an assertive hop character With special Moravian heirloom barley malt traditional decoction mash creates firm yet light body and deep golden color Cold fermentation with Czech lager yeast and lengthy secondary conditioning produce brilliant beer that highlights the spicy and grassy Saaz hops Authenticity in glass Pilz is beer

Our award winning interpretation of Bohemian Style Pilsner Spicy citrus peel botanicals combine with dry peppery finish to create truly thirst quenching lager beer that demands you take more than one sip
A delicate soft Lager authentic to the west coast of the Czech Republic

Czech style pale lager known as Světlé Výčepní The plato strength ABV is the most popular in the Czech Republic as opposed to the plato strength ABV that is more familiar in the US Brewed with European malts Czech Saaz hops and soft water

Our Pilsner is golden and crystal clear lager The hops lend pleasant bitterness and lemony peppery taste They are added at the beginning of the brew for bitterness and the end for flavor The subtle and lightly toasted flavor of the malts is the perfect backbone to showcase the special hop blend Pilsner can be traced to its namesake the city of Plzeň pronounced pilsen in the western half of the Czech Republic once part of Bohemia In Joseph Groll developed the first light colored beer an immediate success Still popular style Pilsner influenced the American light lager we know today IBU
Crisp light bodied and immensely refreshing our small batch Lime Pilsner combines subtle malty sweetness with hints of fresh lime for little splash of summertime in can

Pilsner was first made back in by the Bohemians They used special pale malt and an abundance of hops to create delicious golden beer Up here at Creemore Springs we fire brew our pilsner the same traditional way using only four natural ingredients starting with our own clear flowing spring water It eminently drinkable and always refreshing Classic yet unique it our fresh take on traditional Czech pilsner IBU

Perfect for any relaxing occasion this Bohemian Pilsner sings with fresh clean maltiness and spicy flavor and aroma contributions from traditional Czech Saaz hops Aged cold on Lager yeast for weeks for maximum refreshment If you ve never had Shower Beer it high time Winner of Gold Medal in the Bohemian Style Pilsner category at the Great American Beer Festival IBU
Scrag Mountain Pils was inspired by the traditional Czech Pilsner style Our house lager is tribute to the source of Waitsfield town water and the aquifer deep beneath Scrag Mountain

This authentic Czech Pils is brewed by the famous Samson Brewery This is full bodied beer rich in Saaz hops and brewed following year old tradition by Czech brew mas ters This is crisp refreshing beer with less CO making it less filling but packed with fla vor strong pale malt quality is evident in the taste profile

A European style pilsner Dry hopping produces bouquet of aromas from the addition of traditional noble hops This beer has bigger malt profile than the average American Pilsner It has medium hop bitterness and clean floral finish

Formerly known as Pale Lager Beer This is our take on the renowned Bohemian style pale lager that you might find in Bavaria or the Czech Republic When coming up with the recipe for Pils owner brewmaster Rick brewed batches of this beer to make it perfect The recipe is based on the traditional and beloved Pilsner Urquell which is why we have chosen not to filter our beer and why our lagering time is as long as it is from brewday to when we can or keg Pils it is at least eight weeks Our Pilsner is little more golden rounder and little more malt driven than many other versions The beer possesses strong hop character that is balanced by its rich round malty palate Refreshing and balanced BG IBU SRM

Prima It a German exclamation of joy It a recognition of accomplishment It what escaped from our lips the first time we sampled this mighty pilsner recipe With heaps of whole flower European hops and fine German malts we achieved the bracing herbal bite and smooth malt flavor that we sought Prima an exclamation of Victory Prost IBU

Samuel Adams Noble Pils is brewed with all Noble hops for distinct hop character and fresh taste Deep golden in color with citrusy hop aroma Samuel Adams Noble Pils is traditional Bohemian Pilsner The honeyed malt character from traditional Bohemian malt is balanced by delicate yet pronounced citrus floral and piney notes from the Noble hops The winner of our Beer Lover Choice election this beer was chosen by over drinkers for its crisp complexity and refreshing taste
Also known as Warsteiner Premium VerumA refreshing pale golden pilsener with clean taste perfectly balanced with hints of barley malt subtle bottom fermenting yeast tones and mild hoppy bitterness

Named for the delicate engravings popularized by th century seafarers Scrimshaw is fresh tasting Pilsner brewed in the finest European tradition using Munich malt and Hallertauer and Tettnang hops Scrimshaw has subtle hop character crisp clean palate and dry finish

Pivo Pils is classically rendered pilsner with West Coast dry hopping twist showcasing stylistic inﬂuences from Germany Italy and the Czech Republic Lighter beer styles like pilsner have been hijacked by industrial lager beer in the United States and it time for craft brewers to take it back Pivo Pils oﬀers impeccable balance with ﬂoral aromatics spicy herbal nuances and bergamot zest and lemongrass notes from dry hopping with German Saphir hops

Marketed as Premium Beer in the USA Note first the bright fresh golden colour and rich frothy head so typical of this elegant Pilsner beer Its refined herbal notes are delicately poised followed by nutty and honeyed aftertaste The overall impression of this gently sparkling beer is one of deep harmony with the unmistakeable bitterness of the hops balanced and contained by an agreeable mellow sweetness in the body

Old world craftsmanship with new clean flavors Bright pilsner malts meet Noble hop character The Crisp American Pilsner innovation We were sixty feet underground when the beer came calling While sinking tankards in ancient beer caves near the foot of the Alps inspiration struck and at that exact moment THE CRISP was born The can in your hand turns obsession to reality Now that Crisp

Like the rising sun Sunshine Pils delivers winter spring summer and fall This deceptive complex pilsner is all about the tightrope walk of two row barley zesty Saaz hops and lager yeast It a go to when the sun is shining and it makes us happy when skies are gray
Also known as Bohemia Clásica Golden Pilsner

Brooklyn Pilsner is refreshing golden lager beer brewed in the style favored by New York pre prohibition brewers In the the pilsner style emerged from central Europe to become the world most popular style of beer Like its ancestors Brooklyn Pilsner is traditionally brewed from the finest German two row barley malts German grown Perle and Hallertauer hops provide crisp snappy bitterness and fresh floral aroma The flavor of the malt comes through in the finish We ferment Brooklyn Pilsner at cool temperatures and then give it long gentle maturation lagering which results in beer of superior complexity and smoothness We believe that you will find there to be none finer Unlike mass marketed so called pilsners Brooklyn Pilsner does not contain cheap fillers such as corn or rice nor does it contain any preservatives or stabilizers Brooklyn Pilsner is the real thing
German Amber Lager

Hardly any other premium beer has remained as true to itself as Jever For years now Jever has been cultivating its own Frisian bitter taste The special mix of the best brewing water and high quality hops makes our Jever so Frisian tart and refreshing at the same time
OG ºP IBUs

Known as Pilsner in the USA Golden yellow and bright with bitter units and quite hoppy compared to most of the other Pilsners our Weihenstephaner Pilsner comes up with distinctive aroma of hops with pleasant bitterness This combination provides balanced mix and guarantees great enjoyment Brewed according to our centuries old brewing tradition on the Weihenstephan hill

Krombacher situated in the beautiful hills of Westfalia draws upon the local mountain spring water soft and low in minerals ideal for brewing Pilsner style beer Taste wonderful balance of hops and malt with distinct crispness on the finish IBU
Mary was Edward mother and our great grandmother German style pilsner brewed with our well water American row malt our favorite German hops classic German lager yeast

This Abita Beer is message in bottle distress signal for the troubled waters of our Gulf Coast For every bottle sold Abita will donate to the rescue and restoration of the environment industry and individuals fighting to survive this disastrous oil spill This unfiltered Weizen Pils is made with Pilsner and Wheat malts It is hopped and dry hopped with Sterling and German Perle hops It has brilliant gold color sweet malt flavor and pleasant bitterness and aroma

Made for taking break from the Sturm und Drang of modern life this elegantly refreshing pilsner was created with German malt balanced with the spicy tang of Czech Saaz hops The bread and biscuit flavors of the grain are topped with the floral character of the Noble hop which may just get you to shimmy into your favorite lederhosen bust into quick schuhplattler and loudly proclaim Das ist Vunderbar Prost IBU AKA Short Batch

A golden Munich style Helles Crisp and refreshing this beer is perfect for hot summer day Saint Arnold Summer Pils has delicate sweet malt taste complemented by an abundant hop aroma and flavor This beer is brewed with fine German malt and copious quantity of noble hops imported from the Czech Republic

Traditional in concept with Two Roads twist dry hops We use combination of classic German as well as American hop and malt varieties in our Pils We renovated year old factory building and designed this Pils to have extra aroma so pardon the pun Crisp refreshing refined
Pony Pilsner is firm take on the classic German style aimed to quench the masses German hops and malts are braided together to release the crisp awakening your summer self needs
Named after New Havens historic nickname this is true German Pilsner made with all German ingredients
Mermaid Pilsner is light bodied crisp drinking nicely hopped lager heavy handed addition of rye malt adds mild spiciness which is balanced by light fruity floral hop aroma

A clever woman once said fair is foul and foul is fair On that note we threw in young unacknowledged hoppy pilsner gave it limp wrinkly flavor and finished it off with an insulting high price that will give you foul feeling in your mouth That why we name Evil Twin Brewing Low Life the Golddigger of Beers
Named for Carl Dinkelacker

Embrace classic Hometown Blonde is an Old World style pilsner assertively hopped with four premium hop varieties Tettnanger Saaz Styrian Golding and Strisselpalt varieties all grace this German style brew with the complex character you enjoy in classic pilsner Expect to pour an elegant blonde glass of beer crowned with rich head of foam that resonates with our chorus of hops Although delicate in appearance our Hometown Blonde has backbone but of course that no surprise in Wisconsin Enjoy
This unique pilsener is the first to use the Belma hops discovered growing wild on farm in the Yakima Valley Crisp Refreshing One of kind

Yuengling Golden Pilsner is the newest beer from G Yuengling Son Inc America Oldest Brewery This highly sessionable beer is our interpretation of an outstanding modern pilsner born from six generations of brewing expertise Golden in both name and color Yuengling Golden Pilsner is the perfect balance of hop and malt character for crisp and smooth thirst quenching refreshment
Our distinctive Pilsener beer well balanced bitterness and easy to drink Gold in colour fresh and very digestible
Our Edelherb is the first Kulmbacher Pils and is brewed according to the original recipe In memory of the brewing family

My Antonia named after the Willa Cather read is continually hopped imperial pilsner This lager for ale lovers is citrusy sweet and refined My Antonia started out as collaboration beer when Sam brewed it at Birra del Borgo hope you can read Italian outside Rome Italy with owner brewer Leonardo DiVencenzo in October In we began brewing My Antonia here in Delaware for S distribution

Über PilsArguably our most well balanced beer Small Craft Warning seems at once hop forward and malt forward our brewers debate over which flavor force prevails in the beer Small Craft exemplifies robust pilsner it crisp well carbonated and slightly sweet The beer is characterized by firm malt backbone and pronounced hop character fine aroma from an array of hops completes this quaffable beer

A fortified European style Pilsner lagered to perfection brewed with Heavy Metal Warriors Lair of The Minotaur in commemoration of their fourth full length release Evil Power IBU
Collaboration with Dogfish Head Craft Brewery
Tilted Smile breaks away from the crowd Big in alcohol yet approachable and versatile Confidently balanced with Saaz hops and Pilsen malt Crisp and delightfully carbonated IBU
Brewed at De Proef Brouwerij Lochristi Hijfte Belgium Ingredients Water malts pils carapils and amber light candy sugar hops amarillo and cascade and lager yeast

A double Pilsner with distinct hoppy attributes and pronounced malty backbone It is strong in character and steadfast in its resolve to provide maximum drinking pleasure All hail our Brewmaster and the fruits of his labor Regal Pilsner

Brewed with more ingredients to bump any ordinary pilsner to an imperial level We hop the kettle four times using good amount of Amarillo hops to balance the malty sweetness from the pilsen malt and lots of flaked maze At ABV and Bittering Units this beer is still very quaffable and packed full of flavor thanks to the help of our house American lager yeast This beer was brewed upon the request of every ones favorite beer tender Jeremy the curl VanSice ABV B s
This is Fresh Cut assertive big brother wicked dry hopped pilsner Dripping with juicy citrus hop character this beer is blast of deliciousness We hope you enjoy

Nipponia is brewed using the revived Japanese breed of Kanego Golden barley which was first developed in along with another strain of hops called Japanese bred Sorachi Ace Nipponia is delightfully golden coloured beer with citrus edge and complex and lingering taste Malt Kaneko GoldenHops Sorachi AceAlcohol Vol Color Golden YellowWon Bronze Medal at the Australian International Beer Awards in category D Other International Style Lager Packaged

Humming with citrus and floral fiesta for the senses Mexican Honey Imperial Lager is brewed with Mexican orange blossom honey and Amarillo hops Proud recipient of the Silver Medal at the Great American Beer Festival this award winning cerveza is all buzz no bite

Half the water Twice the awesome When you brew coffee using only half the water you get pretty potent pot of java right Which got us thinking why not try that with beer So we took our original Orange Blossom Pilsner cut the water and voi frickin la pot awesome sauce we call OBP double dose of all natural ingredients including real Orange Blossom Honey No refined sugar It the bee knees brahs

This lagered behemoth is brewed with Galaxy Simcoe and something called Summer hops The lattermost are predominantly exclusively Australian grown and rather low in bittering alpha acids They re known for giving apricot and melon flavors and aromas and while they may not prove as pungent as tropical Galaxy and piney Simcoe throughout this they seem to offer some highly endearing secondary notes of cantaloupe and stone fruit

A strong Imperial Pils with flavors as smooth and crafty as Gollum himself Like the ring which Gollum pursued for the rest of his life his precious pils if your quest leads you to it could extend your life too at least we like to think so It will at minimum make your journey little more enjoyable

The name inspired by the Cascade hop of course and this one were grown in Yakima Valley Hop lineup Cascade Perle Falconers And more Cascade Lagers aren supposed to taste like this At least that what one curmudgeonly dark corner of your head might say while the rest of you gets the hop tingles Sudwerk Cascaderade is dank juicy generous take while the lager fermentation means there less fruitiness to get in the way of the Cascade additions
A hugely hopped rye imperial pale lager weighing in at near IBUs and dosed with Amarillo Mosaic and Simcoe hops It also uses heirloom German rye

Aunt  showing pictures of her  cats Uncle  singing songs about his  divorce Cousin  bragging about  And you can leave It another Christmas adventure for the whole family So come on One more It a celebration Malts PilsnerHops SaazYeast German Ale IBU

Picaroons recipes evolve due to experimentation here an example makeup for this beer Grain Weyermann Bohemian Floor Pilsner Malt Vienna Malt Munich malt Malted wheat Canadian row barley Hops Hersbrucker Hallertau Perle and Saaz Other Irish Moss yeast nutrient gypsum Ringwood yeast water pH

Imperial Mexican Lager is brewed with Mexican Orange Blossom Honey and is aged in tequila barrels for ten months Mexican Cousin is bright crisp and bursting with complex aromas of wild honey cooked agave and mandarin citrus IBU

Bela may sound like sweet name but she actually quite bitter beer style that does not technically exist the addition of over pounds of Czech Saaz hops in this small batch beer results in high hop bitterness and quite obvious Noble hop aroma and flavor It is also high alcohol beer with nice warming effect medium body and some malty residual sweetness to remind you that Bela might still have sweet side after all IBU
The Belle Gueule Houblon is filtered dry hopped lager The nose will hit you with its intriguing floral blend of five American and Noble hops And the mouthfeel such lovely bitterness

The Imperial Pils from the Propeller increases the beer style Pilsener in every way More alcohol more hops more of everything Pils with turbo From the light malt come honey notes and the full bodied and soft mouthfeel The German hops Hercules for the bitterness and Sapphire for the flavors are typical for Pils in the Turbo Prop some Citra hops as added in cold hopping process
India Pale Lager

Tigers Balls of Twine Waimea Bay waves Pyramids Ohakune Carrots Some things are meant to be big Flavours Aromas Beer The list is large but we think it should be bigger There is time and place for subtlety for delicate touch This is not one of them Turning the amplifier up to eleven Yeah that it
Brewed in collaboration with Brew By Numbers Hopped with HBC Citra HBC Ekuanot and HBC Mosaic and brewed it with pilsner malt and oats
Robust and complex our porter is bittersweet tribute to the legendary freighter fallen crew taken too soon when the gales of November came early IBUs
Alc by Vol IBUs calories per oz serving

Deep in the jungles of Papua New Guinea and Madagascar grows the perfect ingredient for an extraordinary Porter brewed in Colorado Breckenridge Brewery Vanilla Porter An ale that has all the chocolate and roasted nut flavor of classic Porter with an enigmatic surprise thrown in for good measure

With deep black color thick creamy head rich chocolate toffee and coffee flavors and full bodied smoothness Anchor Porter is the epitome of handcrafted dark beer blend of specially roasted pale caramel chocolate and black malts along with our top fermenting yeast creates complexity without bitterness The brew is hopped at high rate and naturally carbonated The result is dark in the glass but surprisingly light on the palate

Porter is testament to roasted malts which give it rich bittersweet and roasted coffee like flavor that a perfect complement to variety of foods Before Sierra Nevada was reality our nights were spent perfecting homebrews and dreaming of starting brewery Back then one of our favorites was porter made with homemade malt roasted in our kitchen Decades later we still love the rich bittersweet and roasted malt flavors of that original brew

Ruddy brown in color bittersweet balance of malt and hops yet surprisingly light and refreshing taste Ingredients Row Munich C Chocolate Black Kiln Coffee Rogue Farms Dare Risk Malts Rogue Farms Rebel Liberty Hops Free Range Coastal Water Pacman Yeast IBU

Everett was our grandfather brother Hill Farmstead Brewery rests upon the land that was once home to him and his siblings In his honor this Porter is crafted from American malted barley English and German roasted malts American hops our ale yeast and water from our well It is unfiltered and naturally carbonated Decadent in its depth with complex backbone of chocolate coffee and malty sweetness this is the ale that dream to have shared with Everett Pale Caramel and Chocolate Malt Roasted Barley Columbus hops Ale Yeast and our Well Water

First brewed in this Chocolate Peanut Butter Porter is jet black in color with tan rocky head full body and creamy luxurious mouthfeel Its lightly sweet malty flavor is accented by rich flavors of chocolate coffee and peanut butter and balanced by subtle hop character and moderate abv Sweet Baby Jesus finishes smooth dry and roasty with lingering notes of chocolate and peanut butter so savory you will exclaim its name

Yuengling Black Tan models traditional English Half Half Introduced in Yuengling produced one of the first hand crafted draft blends to lead this style of American brewing Black Tan combines of our popular Dark Brewed Porter and of our Premium Beer to create brew that is rich and dark in color with hints of caramel and coffee from the dark roasted malts
Formerly CoCoNut PorterA robust dark ale with hand toasted coconut hints of mocha IBU
Alpha King festive cousin big American Christmas Porter brewed with English chocolate malt Mexican sugar and of course tons of strange American hops Cheers IBU

Evoking complete diner style breakfast in glass Maple Bacon Coffee Porter is complex beer with multitude of flavors at play It pours an opaque ebony brew with frothy tan head Aromas of sticky maple syrup coffee and cream creep forth from the glass The mouth feel is luxuriously creamy with layers of sweet malt toffee and roast giving way to waves of smoke coffee and salted chocolate It finishes sticky rich and sweet with the flavor of maple syrup lingering pleasantly on the tongue

Last Snow Coconut Coffee Porter is an ode to that special time in Florida where the needle dips just south of even for the briefest of moments This rich creamy porter is layered with coconut and freshly roasted coffee for taste that recalls winter wonderland even if in our state that just state of mind

Our twist on the traditional robust American Porter Shake Chocolate Porter is dark black in color with rich sweet aromatics and flavors of dark chocolate coffee and caramel This unique brew blends five different grains including Chocolate Wheat that along with cacao nibs create devilishly delicious chocolate finish with velvety mouthfeel

Drift into winter with Snowdrift Vanilla Porter back by popular demand as our Winter standalone fuller bodied brew with hints of cocoa coffee and caramel brought out by roasted malts and aged on real vanilla our Leinenkugel Snowdrift Vanilla Porter is smooth and creamy making it perfect for warming up winter

We always love good experimental brew here at Terrapin but the salty sweet combo of peanuts and chocolate has us all salivating little more than usual This brew while smooth and mellow still manages to challenge your tastebuds The porter base is dark and smooth with enough backbone to support the richer chocolate and peanut butter additions It even dry peanuted with brewery boiled green peanuts Here to the candy loving kid in all of us
Our take on an American robust porter Dark thick chewy chocolaty and of course generously hopped

Not quite stout but definitely no lightweight Cutthroat is smooth and robust Inspired by the classic London porters we use dark roasted malts to create deep rich color and flavor that hint at chocolate and coffee We named it Cutthroat as our tribute to the Colorado state fish with its own rich heritage and unmistakable dark coloring And while we re big fans of small batches here to the currently threatened Cutthroat population reaching mass quantities

Twilight of the Idols is our winter porter We brew Twilight each autumn with touch of locally roasted coffee and cinnamon and age it on blend of select vanilla beans Originally conceived with friend in while brewing in Denmark the name of this annual release is inspired by the title of one of the last texts written by one of our philosophical idols Friedrich Nietzsche

This rich dark ale takes BBC popular Drayman Porter and adds Dean Beans organic coffee to the mix creating an enticing blend of everyone favorite beginning and end of day beverages Robust and aromatic Coffeehouse Porter is sure to please no matter what time of day you choose to enjoy it

Yuengling Dark Brewed Porter is an original specialty beer that has been brewed expressly for tavern owners and family trade since We are proud to be recognized as one of the largest porter producers in the US An authentic craft style beer our Porter calls for generous portion of caramel and dark roasted malts which deliver rich full bodied flavor and creamy taste with slight tones of chocolate evident in every sip It pours dark topped with thick foamy head and imparts faint malty aroma This smooth and robust Porter has unique character that complements any meal from steak or seafood to chocolate desserts Yuengling Dark Brewed Porter is enjoyed by even the most discerning consumer for its flawless taste and unwavering quality

This porter ABV IBUs is based on malt flavors of roasted nuts crème brulee cocoa and caramel extracted from English and German roasted and caramel malts Hotbox Roasters then crashes the party and infuses potent cold extracted coffee from Burundi and Ethiopian beans and deals out flavors and aromas of dark plums chocolate and hints of blueberry

Nearly black in color Pecan Porter is made with Organic US row and Crystal malts along with Baird Chocolate and Black malts Its full body and malty sweetness are balanced with subtle pecan aroma and flavor from locally grown pecans Yet another true Austin original
Stout Lager

Our signature porter brewed with oats has soft velvety mouthfeel with layers of chocolate and roasted malt on the palate The ominously black appearance belies this porter approachability Pot Kettle is satisfyingly smooth and nourishing but never lumbering or heavy While not sweet dark fruit notes such as cherries dates and raisins reveal themselves as the beer warms MALT American row Rolled Oats Pale Chocolate Black Patent Carafa III Caramunich HOPS Columbus

Intriguing doses of sweet spices cocoa nibs and pumpkin transform an exceptional porter into mesmerizing potion Pour this tantalizing brew into snifter and experience its many eccentric nuances which will delight your taste buds This is the same award winning recipe that garnered GOLD MEDAL at GABF in Formerly known simply as Imperial Chocolate Pumpkin Porter we ve named it R A The Royal Eccentric Ale Treatment IBU

Originally named after the London market workers who popularized this brew we dubbed our Porter with nod toward the majestic railway stretching from St Paul to Seattle Roasted malts offer up coffee notes and lead to slightly sweet chocolatey finish All aboard

This is the finest purest black Cocoa straight from the source the rugged mountains of Brazil where chocolate is life We smuggled these beans back to our brewhouse where they were blended with creamy milk porter and fragrant Madagascar vanilla beans Get cocoa up

The Duck Rabbit Porter is very dark in color This robust ale features pronounced flavor of roasted grains reminiscent of dark chocolate Also we add oats to the grist for round silky mouthfeel The malt is well balanced with hops to make this fantastic choice for fans of traditional robust full flavored beers We re confident that you ll love this yummy porter

Formerly Shade Grown Coffee Porter Born from owner Brad Farbstein homebrewing experiments in college our porter is rich robust ale with dry finish Fresh cold brewed organic fair trade coffee courtesy of Katz Coffee in Houston TX is added just prior to packaging Our most popular seasonal release it a whole new way to enjoy your coffee with breakfast lunch or dinner rich robust porter with dry finish Brewed with organic hops malted barley and Ruta Maya Shade Grown organic coffee beans from Chiapas Mexico

Penn Quarter Porter is our first in line of draft only limited release beer and it a robust porter In the way that The Public is on the line between pale ale and an IPA this is on the line between porter and stout with chocolate notes and dry roasted finish

Enjoy the blend of chocolate and brown malts in this robust porter with crazy rich color and ruby highlights The subtle bitterness of chocolate is balanced by sweet organic toasted coconut Perfect to pair with food or just to enjoy alone So go nuts you ll be glad you did
Coffee porter aged with Counter Culture coffee Notes of fresh roasted coffee and baker chocolate
The on tap growlers were aged in Jim Beam barrels The bottles were aged in Willet barrels release was aged in Four Roses Plato IBU Unfiltered Unpasteurized
IBU
A Sixpoint Friends jam session one off Made with Mast Brothers Chocolate cacao husks and infused with fresh Stumptown Coffee Roasters cold brew and then aged on oak

The Baltic style Porter has robust malt character and slight herbal hop bitterness Aged for months in year old Kentucky bourbon oak barrels this alluring dark liquid features appealing undertones of vanilla oak cocoa and coffee The aging occurs in abandoned mines in Michigan at constant temperature of F

Big bold black and aged in bourbon barrels with vanilla beans The lengthy conditioning period in the barrels creates silky smooth chocolatey mouth feel enhanced by the use of oats and brown sugar Noticeable sweetness gets balanced by roasted malt and hop bitterness Additional flavors include bourbon vanilla and oak

The Duck Rabbit Baltic Porter is deep rich and velvety soft full blooded roasty character with almost no burnt flavor is balanced by complex alcohol notes Strong alcohol by volume yet unfailingly subtle this special brew rewards unhurried attention Enjoy

Big bold black and barrel aged length conditioning period in bourbon barrels creates silky smooth chocolatey mouth feel enhanced by the use of oats and brown sugar Noticeable sweetness gets balanced by roasted malt and hop bitterness Additional flavors include bourbon vanilla and oak IBU

Ebony hued Smoke wafts out of the bottle and into your senses borne on the wings of European traditions wrapped in American innovation Lager brewed like any true Baltic Porter with smoked malts from Bamberg Germany the home of Rauchbiers then mellowed by oak aging Black malt flavors mesh with notes of raisins plums figs and licorice with the subtle smoke on the side for complex and luxurious yet silky smooth drinking experience It a sipper at Alc by VOL but everyone knows you can have Smoke without fire
Dark porter type beer was brewed in Żywiec as early as It owes its intense color and clear flavor to four types of malt

Big Bold and Black This unusual lager style has many similarities to Imperial Stouts lengthy conditioning period creates silky smooth chocolatey mouth feel enhanced by the use of oats and brown sugar Noticeable sweetness gets balanced by roasted malt and hop bitterness At alcohol by volume this beer is sure to keep you warm on cold winter night IBU

First introduced in Strong beers were banned in Sweden The original recipe was re introduced in as beer fermented with both top and bottom yeast In the yeast was changed to single bottom fermenting strain In the label design and name was changed from Carnegie Stark Porter to Carnegie Porter IBU
This strong Baltic style Porter has rich velvety mouthfeel with notes of bakers chocolate and molasses
Framinghammer Baltic Porter aged in bourbon barrel with peanut butter and raspberries
Framinghammer with Coconut and Cocoa Nibs added and aged in bourbon barrels

Robust dark lager inspired by Porters from around the Baltic Sea region This beer is luxuriously round with mild bitterness The malts contribute flavors of coffee chocolate and vanilla The use of cherry wood smoked malt provides subtle hint of smoke

Collaboration with Cigar City BrewingThis collaboration represents unique fusion of styles and balance It was brewed when CCB brewmaster Wayne Wambles and owner and CEO Joey Redner visited San Diego late last year The name Jurata pronounced Yoo rah tuh is Polish for sea and rings true with both Coronado and Cigar City beside opposite oceans It is also mythical mermaid in the Baltic Sea

The Mad Scientists walked through an ancient bazaar sniffing out ingredients for their next formulation The stalls were buzzing with activity as exotic spice vendors promoted their fragrant wares But what ingredient would make the fabled th bean The enticing aroma of an oily smoky pod black cardamom caught their attention Now that would turn the Imperial to Bazaar
In this quite dark ale dark malts provide flavors of coffee and dried fruit Try with dark chocolate cheese or red meat dishes IBU

This style shares many characteristics with Russian Imperial Stout at times the two are almost indistinguishable Baltic Porter is full bodied and jet black in color with brilliant garnet highlights and dense tan head The smooth deep maltiness is accentuated by raisin and licorice notes as well as chocolate and mild coffee characters touch of cherry and dried fruit flavors are also evident with mellow vanilla background rounding the finish The oak brings hints of bourbon and hot toffee and contributes to the warmth of this richly flavorful beer IBU
this dark lager gets its special twist from hefty addition of Bamberg smoked malt Note that Baltic Porters are often fermented with lager yeast

Big flavors do not have to be synonymous with one and done beers We love dessert just as much as we love dark beer and we think that enjoying more than one of either should never be problem In this medium bodied Baltic Porter we use combination of specialty malts and caramel to capture rich flavors like chocolate caramel and vanilla alongside lager yeast that brings clean finish This Baltic Porter pairs well with dishes such as chocolate mole or caramel flan
Baltic porter aged in bourbon barrels with cocoa nibs chili peppers vanilla bean and whole cinnamon sticks

Live long and drink Cosmic Ristretto This highly revered brew will go down in history as one of the first graduates of our Genius Lab program into our front line Marvel at its rich black appearance with bruleed edges and mocha colored beer foam Breathe in its coffee aroma and sweet malts and savor its smooth espresso chocolate flavor Don fight its gravitational pull This bold complex java centric Baltic Porter with Espresso is irresistible Houston we have problem my glass is empty

Dominion Baltic Porter is brewed to meet your need for warmth on cold winter night Hints of licorice toffee chocolate mingle with touch of Rye giving our Porter full bodied taste Raise your mug to those who were bold enough to brave the Baltic

Tsarina Esra is an imperial porter style with his roots in England from many ages ago It fullness it richness in flavor and it warming feeling makes it perfect for cold nights Because of the enduring barrel aging in Ardbeg whisky barrels this edition is enriched with crazy really peat flavours It was injected with Brett while in the barrels Flavor indication Chocolate liquorice funky peaty

Danzig which we named after Baltic Sea town isn for the faint of heart or mouth It a well balanced full bodied blend of strong English porter and Germanic black lager making it smooth with sneaky high ABV The intense mix of malts and hops provides flavors of chocolate coffee and caramelized sugar No wonder it won Bronze at the World Beer Cup It full on Hence the lightning bolt on the pack Malts Pilsner Vienna Dark Munich Carafa II CaraRed Brown Malt Chocolate MaltHops Northern Brewer TettnangIBU COLOR Black
Brewed in collaboration with Shelton Brothers Lots of rye malt and spices inspired by the dark German bread
Matured on Aquavit casks

Fear and Trembling is Hill Farmstead first collaboration Baltic Porter brewed with malt that was hand smoked over maple wood by our Danish friend and former colleague Anders Kissmeyer This bottled version was blended from beer aged in both American Oak Cabernet barrels and Bourbon barrels As student of philosophy and former resident of Copenhagen it is fitting that our brewer named our first collaboration after Denmark great thinker Søren Kierkegaard All three contemplated absurdity faith and salvation while wandering the shores of the Baltic Sea continue to work out your salvation with fear and trembling

Saranac Chocolate Orange is limited edition small batch brew from our High Peaks series line of beers that are bigger more complex and flavorful Brewed as full bodied robust Baltic style porter with five different hops and four different malts this beer pushes the porter style to new level We start with generous amounts of chocolate malt and then add blood orange peel In fermentation the finest hand selected purest cacao nibs are added to enhance the chocolate malt flavor Look for dark chocolate roasted flavor finished off with unique surprise from blood orange peel making this an extra special treat

Weighing in at ABV Alice Porter hides huge complexity behind her modest strength Roasty and smooth with fruity rich coffee character Alice Porter takes sudden twist in an unexpected direction blend of hops that add light balancing citrusy twist and subtle spiciness Alice Porter is the first of our seasonal brews
Brewed with liquorice The recipe was developed during the at the Urban brewery in Aalborg Thisted bought the name and the production restarted in

Baltic Porter Aged with Artisan Coffee beansPart of our Rotating Roasters Series each batch release features different roaster and their unique style of roasting Through conditioning our Baltic Porter with freshly roasted beans we strive for balanced character adding dark sugar plums and cocoa notes to the robust porter base

Fuller London Porter is an award winning example of this historic English style smooth and creamy with delicious chocolate and coffee flavors derived from the roasted malt The griffin Brewery is Chiswick London has brewing fine ales since The Fuller Smith Turner partnership dating back to brews an excellent range of award winning beers many of which are available in the S including London Pride pale ale and the Old original ESB
Legend has it that Old Engine Oil was dedicated to our Head Brewer love of classic cars But it the thick dark chocolatey viscosity that reveals the real inspiration behind the name

The intense flavors of dark roasted malt in Boulevard rendition of the classic English porter are perfectly balanced by generous and complex hop character Bully Porter robust nature makes it the ideal companion to variety of foods from seafood to chocolate IBU
People Porter is robust English style brew with dark ruby hue Complex chocolate caramel and toffee notes give way to an herbal bitterness finishing with pleasant hint of espresso IBU

Formerly General Washington Tavern PorterDetailed in letter from the General to his officers during the war Washington recipe employed molasses to aid fermentation and give rich caramel notes to this robust roasty ale The recipe reflected his admiration for Philadelphia style porters especially those brewed by Robert Hare whose original brewery stood just blocks from where ours is now Our Tavern Porter inspired by Washington is dark smooth and complex with just hint of dried fruit in the finish

Taking its cues from Three Threads bartender blend of three distinct ales Porter became the beer of choice for th century Londoners Mayflower Porter embraces this history This complex brew is smooth and full flavored with notes of roasted coffee beans and bittersweet chocolate that will warm the palate all year long Mayflower Porter is rich complex brew that is smooth and full flavored Five varieties of malted barley provide notes of roasted coffee beans and bittersweet chocolate with hint of smokiness

A blend of mature and young ale creates porter of traditional character that dark cherry in colour and complex in taste Aromas of liquorice rum raisin and chocolate with hints of coffee are in abundance in this full bodied warming ale

Whilst we would not recommend having this at breakfast with your bacon and eggs our Coffee Beer is made with real coffee and has caffeine hit to match The natural flavors of the beans selected and hand roasted by our friends at the Union Coffee Roasters go well with the roast barley in the beer to give silky smooth drink with distinct chocolate and vanilla notes
A porter brewed with lambic yeast

Porter was the great London beer style of the th and th centuries when the city was revered as both the brewing capital and trading hub of the world Named after the legions of porters in her docks streets and markets who drank this powerful beer to slake their thirst Meantime London Porter is classic interpretation of this complex dark beer style Wonderful with mature cheese beef lamb or as traditionally served with oysters

Dark full bodied and rich in flavor Green Man Porter is wonderfully easy to drink It offers creamy smooth mouthfeel and finishes with distinctive chocolate notes This traditionally crafted award winning British style Porter like true rock star enjoys legendary following

Formerly Steelhead Scotch Porter and Steelhead PorterThis traditionally styled Porter has complex malt characteristics balanced with mild hop profile Scottish smoked and peated malts lend added complexity and mild smokey flavor

A rich chocolaty English Porter with clean finish We use the finest floor malted Maris Otter malts from England the same malts used for the best single malt scotch portion of malted rye gives spicy slightly dry finish IBU
A Robust Porter

Faithfully recreated by Geary this classic English style has deep mahogany color and restrained roasted malt flavor The result is rich and complex yet smooth and refreshing Original gravity alcohol by volume two row English malt pale crystal chocolate and black Cascade Willamette and Golding hops
Stranger Than Fiction is full bodied porter with plenty of roast flavour with hints of molasses Ridiculous amounts of chocolate and pale ale malts make this porter smooth and creamy brew IBU

Standing above sea level one of the Adirondack high peaks Porter Mountain is the inspiration for our Porter that is full of roasted flavor Brewed with English chocolate malt and English hops you ll taste roasted coffee and chocolate flavors from the malt balanced with slight hop bitterness Whether you re up at or at sea level this style will have your taste buds climbing with excitement IBU

A group of enterprising brewers on quest to explore new recipes reinterpret old ones and collaborate freely to bring exciting beers to life style with origins from our brewers diaries dating back to West Indies Porter is complex yet mellow hoppy with notes of toffee and chocolate IBU

A black ale that puts the flavor of the malt front and center It has mild hop character that balances strong notes of cocoa and hints of coffee full bodied roasty treat that finishes dry Pairs well with chocolate BBQ as well as fresh shellfish
Our porter is dark in color yet soft on the palate English chocolate malts give it complex rich flavor wrapped in silky smooth finish

Historically the term used to describe porter blended from variety of ales entire butt uses different malts and hops to recreate this forgotten style of porter The beer is black brown with crisp white head and is distinctly vinuous It has little hop character as essentially the flavour is derived from the malts Malts used pale Maris Otter lager wheat pale crystal dark crystal dark chocolate pale chocolate black roasted barley caramalt torrified wheat amber malt brown malt and malted oats
Collaboration with Terrapin Beer Co
English Porter made with all imported English malt and hops except for the rye malt

BLACK WYCH Dark Mysterious Spellbinding PorterBLACK WYCH spellbinding porter The Black Wych has cast her spell start with measure of alluring rich dark malt allow the bitterness to creep in This silkily smooth porter is force to be reckoned with Brewed primarily for export
Dark and earthy this robust porter exhibits rich mocha like complexity with dry finish that keeps all hands on deck
Brewed in the style of English porters Rickard Dark is creamy with smooth finish that holds just hint of pure Quebec maple syrup
Made with eight different malts four types of hops and touch of Lancaster County molasses this tasty brew has rich brown hue with medium to full body flavor
Scotch Porter sensual dark brew with the softness of Scotch ale crafted with the malt make up of an English porter

Classic Pairings in History Stevie Wonder Paul McCartney Super Dave Osborne Mr Fuji Cheddar cheese pickles Bob Doug McKenzie Mork Mindy Bonnie Clyde Chocolate Beer We say that Longboat is classic chocolate porter but lets face it who ever heard of chocolate porter It is however rich dark ale with distinctive chocolate finish Comes in mL bottle cause mL just isn enough
This silky smooth and elegant English Style Porter brewed with Hedonist Artisan Chocolate is seductively complex with its rich caramel aroma and flavors that are balanced by bittersweet finish
This is our signature ale Busted Knuckle is hybrid ale most similar to light porter We say light because while it does have complexity it is also very smooth and approachable beer

Formerly SDBW Peanut Butter Cup PorterThis decadent twist on robust porter packs rich layers of smooth peanut butter and dark chocolate flavors Now back by popular demand San Diego original peanut butter beer makes special appearance every fall

In the old brewery we had problem with slugs getting into the brewery As the beer leaves trail down the glass as you drink it like slug that how the beer was named delicious traditional porter with full bodied taste of chocolate coffee blackcurrant and black cherry with good aroma near black colour with good white head when served through tight sparkler

First brewed by Harvest Moon in this beer is multiple award winning dark ale brewed in the Burton England style owing to the similarity of water chemistry in Belt compared to this classic porter producing area in England Plenty of body without sharp bite this ale is brewed with pale caramel chocolate and black malts to create creamy smooth roasted slightly chocolate tasting ale with touch of hops in the finish This ale can be enjoyed in every season and is best when served cool not cold And why the name While drinking this new brew one evening back in the local hog farmer showed up to collect our spent mash and we that what could be better for fattening pigs

Our Victory at Sea Imperial Porter is bold smooth brew with just the right amount of sweetness We infused this robust porter with whole vanilla beans and San Diego own Caffe Calabria coffee beans The subtle roasted notes and minimal acidity of the cold brewed coffee balances perfectly with the sweet caramel undertones of the malt creating winning combination for your palate

Too weird to live too rare to die Gonzo Imperial Porter is bold and forceful like the man it was brewed to honor Dr Hunter Thompson Complex layers of roasted chocolate coffee brown sugar and vanilla malt flavors are balanced with one of kind hop bite that hits you like homemade firecracker Buy the ticket and take the ride by pairing this rich and creamy porter with blue cheeses smoked meats BBQ chili chocolate and coffee desserts Best shared with your closest circle of friends real or hallucinated Malts Caramel Black ChocolateHops Northern Brewer CascadeYeas American Ale English AleIBU ABV varies

Did the flavors of sugar and bitter sweet almonds and coffee in Imperial Biscotti Break also make you sentimental Now we topped it off with insane amounts of doughnuts This all time American favorite is making it way back into the spotlight and we at Evil Twin Brewing are not letting tasty trend pass us by without taking it to the next level Drink it with great gusto Forza Doughnuts

This Imperial Porter was made with coconut and turbinado sugar then laid down and aged in bourbon barrels for several months With classic film reference weaved into the label art we hope you enjoy this product as much as we did making it generous donation will be made to The Raider Project for each bottle sold to thank them for what they do for our Marine Veterans Green Bowling Ball Purple Bowling Ball Orange Bowling Ball Silver Bowling Ball

Birth of Tragedy is the imperial and oak barrel aged version of our annual winter porter Twilight of the Idols Brewed with locally roasted coffee and Vermont honey we age this beer for year in personally selected bourbon barrels from our favorite distilleries

What better than beer for breakfast How about little Morning Wood This Imperial version of Maple Bacon Coffee Porter is aged in Bourbon barrels for months lending smoothness to the smokey salty rich combo of maple syrup fresh roasted coffee and bacon ABV varies from batch to batch

The Holidays brings out the best in some people However if the Holidays also is tough one for you this beer will definitely sweeten dark times of endless caroling and difficult domestic obligations Did Imperial Biscotti Break also make your sugar levels rise and the bitter sweet flavors of coffee almonds and chocolate very sentimental this one has sour cherry cherry on top Forza Imperiale

Rise and shine buttercup it time for breakfast This imperial version of our infamous Maple Bacon Coffee Porter adds some girthy gravity to the the smokey salty rich combo of maple syrup fresh roasted coffee and bacon

Aged for months in oak whiskey barrels from Smith Bowman our deep and dark Gonzo gets even more mysterious with notes of vanilla and whiskey warmth Malts Caramel Black ChocolateHops Northern Brewer CascadeYeast American Ale and English Ale IBU

This Imperial version of our Last Snow porter is rich thick decadent treat Pitch black and viscous it made with coconut and fresh roasted coffee We then age it in Bourbon barrels for months to accentuate the vanilla and coconut notes Originally brewed in collaboration with our friends at Park Tavern in Delray Beach
Formerly known as Morning Bell Cinnamon Maple SyrupImperial Milk Porter coffee maple syrup cinnamon
Oak Aged Imperial Porter Brewed with Chocolate Caldera Kettle SeriesJune first release in waxed oz bottles

We partnered with our friends at High West Distillery to create barrel aged version of Ballast Point Victory at Sea our award winning Imperial Porter with cold steeped coffee and vanilla From blend of Ballast Point Victory at Sea aged in High West own bourbon rye whiskey oak casks new layers of complexity emerge with notes of soft caramel and smoky oak over dark chocolate and roasted almond body High West crafts delicious and distinctive whiskeys to honor the American West making it the perfect pairing with our signature San Diego born porter

This Peppermint Victory at Sea is festive take on our popular Imperial Porter We took our trademark robust porter brewed with Caffe Calabria coffee and vanilla and added dose of refreshing peppermint The trio of flavors play perfectly on your palate the brew sweet roastiness balances nicely with cool minty finish You might even call it breath of fresh beer
Coffee beans used are blend of Costa Rican and Sumatran from Berres Brothers Coffee Roasters in Watertown Wi

This Coconut Victory at Sea takes our popular Imperial Porter to another place We added sweet roasted coconut to our robust porter brewed with Caffe Calabria coffee and vanilla the perfect complement to this beer subtly roasty intensity favorite at our annual Victory at Sea Day but it worth enjoying anytime you need to be transported

Annually released Imperial Porter brewed with Caribbean unrefined sugar and aged in Virginia Gentleman Bourbon barrels Notes of rich chocolate and caramel are complemented by vanilla and the aroma of Bourbon Exceptional depth and balance in rich seductive experience
Aged in Rye Whiskey barrels
Mexican Brunch our Imperial Milk Porter made with Rook coffee maple syrup cinnamon cacao and chilies
Imperial Oatmeal Porter Porter brewed with coffee beans and aged in bourbon barrels blended with Porter brewed with coffee beans

F N Series Apr aged in barrels from Heaven Hill Distillery which included Evan Williams Elijah Craig and Old FitzgeraldF N Series May aged in barrels from Evan Williams Elijah Craig and Old FitzgeraldF N Series Nov aged in barrels from Makers Mark and Four Roses

Our imperial milk porter brewed with Rook Coffee Roasters dark roast Sumatra coffee We added healthy amount of milk sugar to an already complex dark malt bill to sweeten and balance the bold flavors and roasty bitterness of the coffee The result of this collaboration is full bodied porter with big bold flavors and remarkable smoothness

Roebling Imperial Porter brings together Cincinnati coffee Ugandan vanilla beans and raw organic turbinado sugar into big rich chocolate espresso infused brownie of beer that is as innovative as its namesake Rivertown was asked to craft beer for community festival in which celebrated the th Birthday of the John Roebling Suspension Bridge linking Cincinnati OH and Covington KY This Imperial Porter is inventive unique well balanced strong and has been created to be as timeless and remarkable as the Roebling Bridge the man who dreamed big and the community that brought that dream to life

Double Pecan Porter is robust porter accented by locally grown roasted pecans and subtly enhanced by aging in recently emptied oak whiskey barrels For the first ever bottling only one L barrel was bottled Notes of chocolate coffee and pecan marry with the subtle flavors of vanilla and whiskey to make this wonderful winter warmer worth sharing and savoring We sincerely hope you enjoy every sip Jack Daniels barrels Maker Mark barrels Jack Daniels barrels Maker Mark barrels

A barrel aged Imperial Coffee Porter Blackbeard Breakfast is robust porter with new world twist Aged in bourbon barrels and brewed with local Chesapeake Bay Roasting Company Dark Sumatra coffee this porter is flavorful and complex Featuring unique English malts this brew will have strong notes of caramel and slight nut character Paired with bourbon notes and the sumptuous Sumatran Coffee Blackbeard Breakfast will please coffee and beer connoisseurs alike The limited draft only version is finished with house made caramel and salt to create an even more complex and tantalizing flavor
Chocolatey beyond compare Rye Barrel Chocolate Porter is made with our Imperial Porter brewed with cocoa nibs and aged in rye barrels

Batch Barrel aged for months in hand select bourbon barrels from our favorite distilleries Batch Our Everett porter aged for over months in hand selected bourbon barrels from some of our favorite distilleries ml
