Allagash Black is Belgian style stout brewed with Row barley torrified wheat oats both roasted and chocolate malt and generous portion of dark caramelized candi sugar The silky mouth feel is great balance to the roasted character coffee and dark chocolate notes expressed throughout this beer

Brewed only for the Christmas and New Year Noël complete the Delirium trilogy Its appearance is superb warm copper to red color recalling Nocturnum except in its taste It hides its subtlety by multiple levels of flavor and should be approached with confidence with tinge typical Christmas sauced with sweet touch then bitterness IBU

Formerly Gouden Carolus Cuvée Van De Keizer Blauw Every year on the th of February we celebrate the birth of Charles Quint Therefore we brew special beer in limited edition called Gouden Carolus Cuvée van de Keizer Imperial Dark Grand Cru of the Emperor This exceptional ale ages well developing refined complexity and intense aromas With powerful notes of roasted malts caramel and plums its surprisingly soft and fruity aroma combines warm roundness with refreshing taste It is imperially crowned with cork so it can be preserved for long period of time at constant cellar temperature of An imperial beer to cherish and enjoy in moderation
Collaboration with Russian River Brewing Company
Our Raison Etre with little extra This immodest brew made with an obscene amount of malt brown sugar raisins takes Belgian style browns to new heights
Belgian Strong Dark ale brewed with cinnamon on oak chips with figs

Here in Brooklyn we ve combined European malt and hops Belgian dark sugar and raw wildflower honey from New York family farm to create Brooklyn Local Our special Belgian yeast adds hints of spice to the dark fruit caramel and chocolate flavors After bottle re fermentation the beer reveals marvelous dry complexity enjoyable by itself or at the dinner table

When the little animals in Fairyland hibernate the Achouffe gnomes love to gather in their cottage By the gentle firelight they spend long evenings telling the best Ardennes stories while enjoying delicious Ice CHOUFFE Smooth and strong with spicy notes of thyme and Curacao this dark beer warms both hearts and atmospheres making even the coldest winters joyful

Among the mythical characters living in Fairyland some are more unusual than others Malcolm for example is different because of his accent and his kilt when it comes to beer his favourite is Mc CHOUFFE The delicious flavours of aniseed liquorice and toffee tickle his taste buds If you listen to him he will boast of its ruby sparkle its smooth bitterness and its strong character worthy of his native Scotland Although robust Mc CHOUFFE goes down as easily as LA CHOUFFE ABV varies from time to time
This French oak aged bottle refermented dark ale has remarkable and complex flavor profile Its Grande Réserve appellation is fitting endorsement of its exceptional aging qualities

Ommegang Adoration brewed in the authentic style of Belgian winter or noel beer is dark malty and assertively spiced Adoration is best sipped before roaring fire It would also be tasty accompaniment to dark roasts and wild game Even at abv the beer is well balanced and not at all hot or fiery The dark malts give it lush malty flavors including coriander orange peel mace cardamom and grains of paradise Hopping is modest as befits such beer
Aged in oak barrels hand bottled corked caged bottled conditioned
Belgian Christmas Ale aged in oak barrels

Bottle conditioned AleSmith Grand Cru really needs to be tasted to be truly appreciated Toasty caramelly flavors as well as flavors imparted by the Belgian yeast strain predominate over tapestry of subtle nuances Winner of the blue ribbon at the California State Fair it is thing of beauty It is available in ml champagne bottles

A stronger version of our Lost and Found Abbey Ale brewed to more contemplative alcohol content Massive in every stretch of the brewing way possible this is the sort of beer that will remind beer drinker who considers themselves saint that even saints stray as sinners from time to time
Also known as Bush De Noël

For more than years we had to miss the Christmas beer but in the tradition was restored with Gouden Carolus Christmas It a strong dark ruby red beer with character and contains an alcohol percentage of alc vol Brewed in August the beer rests few months to reach an optimal balance Three kinds of hops and different kinds of herbs and spices define the rich taste of this Christmas beer Top class
From Japan most prestigious brewery Hitachino Nest XH Extra High is strong Belgian Brown Ale matured in shochu distilled sake barrels Chinook Styrian Goldings hops are use

Grand Cru is brewed with touch of peated malt and spiced with coriander sweet orange peel and hint of anise It is deep golden in color full bodied and has hints of smoke and licorice in the taste and aroma The malty warming finish is perfect for colder weather
Formerly Monk Elixir

Human history is filled with myths and legends that shape and define our culture Rituals celebrations gatherings whatever One thing that for sure is we enjoy proper shindig So let get the stories flowing and share little Folklore bracingly deep ale built dark and rich with an elegantly lean body accompanied by heady aromas of Belgian yeast earthy hops and gently kissed by wisp of smoke This beer was formerly known as to One
Belgian style stout partially aged in bourbon barrels abv IBUMalts North American Row Carawheat Munich L Chocolate Roasted Barley Brown MaltHops Magnum GlacierMojo Dark Belgian Candi Syrup

Our brewmaster Jef Versele crafted this exclusive Gulden Draak Brewmasters Edition as tribute to his grandfather Jozef Van Steenberge and the th birthday of the brewery His inspiration came from his numerous trips to the United States and his deepest respect for the craft beer culture This exclusive Gulden Draak combines the technology and the craftsmenship of the traditional brewing process By letting the beer mature on whiskey barrels it gives it distinctive and gentle finish that you have never tasted before

The inspiration for this beer name previously La Maitresse du Moine is the beer itself Its deep intense flavors inspired the concept of monk that seeks solace and satisfaction from the sensory pleasure and mind provoking effects of this liquid temptress Mesmerizing Monk Mistress seduces your senses at first sip Its daunting beauty and intriguing flavor fully captivate your attention Belgian yeast adds character and complexity We invite you to give in to this little bit of heaven on earth IBU

This is truly unique brew combining some unusual elements to create powerful yet flavorful brew brewed similar beer to this one back in while was home brewing out in California Only this time around decided to age it in bourbon barrels to add new element to the already rich sensory profile The combination of dark malt elderberries and bourbon barrels makes for an interesting tasting experience This is sippin beer so sit back by the fire and enjoy

A Duvel is still seen as the reference among strong golden ales Its bouquet is lively and tickles the nose with an element of citrus which even tends towards grapefruit thanks to the use of only the highest quality hop varieties This is also reflected in the flavour which is beautifully balanced with hint of spiciness Thanks to its high CO content this beer has wonderful roundness in the mouth Duvel is both the perfect thirst quencher and the ideal aperitif

Colour and sight pale blond the fine and regular effervesce ensures fine and stable head Scent Slightly malty nice touch of alcohol spicy Flavour Feels like the sound shot of alcohol is igniting the mouth In reality the tongue and palate are warmed The taste is characterized by its roundness The aftertaste is strong long lasting and dry bitter
Golden sunrise color baking spice aroma fruity biscuity malt flavor dry body

Inspired pretty much by Duvel and other strong golden ales of Belgium It is medium bodied has fruity banana bouquet and dry spicy finish AvailabilityPub draft and bottles local distribution draft and bottles some draft to some distributors bottles to all distributors year roundOriginal Gravity Alcohol by Volume Color GoldenBitterness Mild

Belgian Ales represent the height of the brewers art Sophisticated brewing techniques yeast blends and unique flavoring elements have elevated the beers of Belgium to the status enjoyed by wine in other countries PranQster follows in this tradition using mixed culture of antique yeast strains that produce floral nose full fruity flavor and clean finish IBU

The gnomes of Fairyland are particularly fond of this golden beer LA CHOUFFE with its slight hoppy taste combining notes of fresh coriander and fruity tones is the drink which gives them their zest for life At least that what these imps say when they are thirsty Their secret used to be jealously guarded from one generation to the next until the day they shared the recipe with humans to seal their friendship Of all the legends from the wonderful region of the Belgian Ardennes the tale of LA CHOUFFE is the one which most merits re telling
Belgian Strong Pale Ale re fermented with Bordeaux wine yeast
Brewed with German malts and hops first pressing Demerara cane sugar from Mauritius and Belgian yeast strain bottle re fermentation OG AE Classified as strong saison by Garrett Oliver

formerly known at Mischief Mischief is hoppy Belgian style golden ale This wickedly good golden ale is fiendishly dry hopped with American hops to add layer of complexity and mystery to its fruity dry Belgian style character Citrus and resin diabolically combine with ripe melon pear and slight peppery spice in precariously effervescent mixture Enjoy it but you ll want to keep an eye out Gold Medal Great American Beer Festival American Belgo Style Ale
Belgian Specialty Ale

Malts Pilsner Carapils Flaked Oats flaked Red Wheat Special BHops two Saaz varieties additionsSpices noneSugar yesYeast Chouffe yeast in primary fermentation Ommegang yeast in bottle conditioningOG PlatoFG PlatoIBU

Stille Nacht Silent Night is prestige beer from De Dolle Brouwers brewed for Christmas It has very potent beer alc vol It has been boiling for many hours brewed with pale malt with white candy sugar in the kettle The Nugget hops gives an extra bitterness to balance the extreme sweetness due to the density The taste triangle is completed with some acidity of the fermentation It is very interesting beer to age We have samples of every bottling we have done so far and aging hasn decreased the quality of this beer Keep some samples at and mark the year on the cap with an alcohol marker Cheers

Allagash Confluence Ale is created with mixed fermentation utilizing our house primary Belgian style yeast in combination with our proprietary Brettanomyces strain The two yeast strains work in tandem creating marriage between spice and fruit flavors that ultimately leave lingering silky mouth feel Confluence is brewed with blend of both imported pilsner and domestic pale malts as well as portion of caramel malt resulting in complex malty profile Tettnang and East Kent Golding hops are added in the brew process to balance the intricate malty profile while adding sweet and spicy citrus aroma After fermentation Confluence undergoes lengthy aging process in stainless steel tanks to enhance the flavors Prior to bottling it is dry hopped with Glacier hops providing pleasant balance of aromas

Named after brother Isidorus Koningshoeven Abbey first brewer Brewed to mark the occasion of the Trappist brewery th anniversary in Isid or was so well received that it earned itself permanent place in La Trappe line up Unfiltered slightly sweet amber ale with hint of caramel which continues to ferment after bottling and has rich slightly bitter flavour and fruity aftertaste

Corruption Greed and Lust they re all represented on he books today Tomorrow they ll be stringing Gluttony Desire and Sloth Go ahead tell yourself you re better than all of them But you can Hell can be funny like that Down here it all just sin Everyone here is screwed just like you They don care who you sliced diced or cheated No one is escaping this heinous place Your roommate is an axe murderer Eerily he not threatening How can he be The Fallen Angel owns your body mind and soul As such no one can take your life It already been taken Or was it given Neither matters Did you seriously think you were living virtuous life At least Satan serves beer in Hell He brews it himself right there in that flame stoked cauldron Rumor has it the beer is straw yellow bone dry and simply labeled Inferno

Also known as Bush AmbréeThe Scaldis Amber is flushed with bitter sweet taste and pleasing consistency courtesy in part of its balanced caramel malts Those malts also introduce strong streak of roasted nuts adding to this beer stand out flavour Despite its initial filtering the re fermentation has given the beer natural cloudiness while also making for mild and tender mouth feel

Faithfull Ale is celebration of Pearl Jam th anniversary as band and its extraordinary debut album Ten In recognition of these milestones this Belgian style golden ale is delicately hopped to IBUs and fruit forward from incremental additions of black currants over one hour boil Faithfull clocks in at ABV

We took our double gold medal winning Brainless Belgian added organic peach puree and aged it in French Chardonnay casks from Sawtooth Winery Drink from Pinot glass serve on the warm side of cold it develops nicely as it warms displaying more fruit and wine

Boskeun is the nickname of Jo one of the two brothers who preferred to brew blond beer at home It is special Easter beer one of the first real Belgian Easter beers Slaghmuylder paasbier being first It has been brewed with pale malt Golding hops cane sugar and refermented in the bottle It a seasonal beer so we suggest not to keep it eternally The name Boskeun means rabbit of the wood virgin wood maybe and the label shows it sampling the last brew

Victoria Ale was inspired by visit to Victoria Mansion in Portland Maine and the visual references to Bacchus the god of wine The brewer decided to fuse the worlds of beer and wine Over two hundred pounds of Chardonnay Vidal Blanc in grapes were brought in crushed on site and added directly to the mash Victoria Ale aroma is fruity spice and the taste presents subtle notes of green banana black pepper and fresh crushed mint With focus on the subtle wine like character of the grapes the ABV brew boasts pale copper color Belgian yeast influence and medium body with long candied fruit finish with hints of honeydew melon and of course white wine grapes

The Victor Ale was inspired by its feminine named predecessor the Victoria Ale With chardonnay grapes to make the Victoria Ale unique our brewers decided to use red grapes for the Victor Over one hundred pounds of cabernet franc grapes were crushed on site and added directly to the mash In addition to generous portion of Pilsner malt Victor is hopped with Fuggles and Hallertau and fermented with wine yeast strain With focus on the subtle wine like character of the grapes the ABV brew maintains copper color wine yeast influence and medium body with tart and spicy finish

Tsjeeses is jolly blond winter ale with fluffy white cap Its aroma is elegant with hints of fruit spices refreshing herbs and noble hops The taste is robust very complex and quite dry for its style This warming ale is our gift to you for the holidays Enjoy Brewed and bottled on the Deca Brewery in Woesten Vleteren EBC IBU OG FG ABV Hops Marynka Brewers Gold

Père Noël is Christmas ale though very different from any other Christmas ales you might know While most Christmas ales are rich sweet this one is amber coloured vol Alc strong and tastes quite bitter The complex taste is completed with the addition of liquorice In the recipe we can also find pale malt Munich malt Caramel malt Brewers Gold hops and Hallertau hops

We took our double gold medal winning Brainless Belgian added cherry puree and aged it in French Chardonnay casks for secondary fermentation in the barrels Pours beautiful deep ruby color with medium white head nice nose of sweet cherries Belgian malts and barrel aging
Brewed at De Proef Brouwerij Lochristi Hijfte Belgium Ingredients Water malt pale and cara light candy hops hallertauer and styrian goldings yeast and brettanomyces

Our tribute to the devil beers of Belgium This beer is light in color with full flavor and dry finish Be careful as it may sneak up on you After receiving cease and desist letter on behalf of musician Ozzy Osbourne the Baltimore brewery has renamed its Ozzy beer Beazly It is named after Mark Barcus bartender of the Mount Vernon bar for nearly years His nickname around the bar is Beazly Both rich and dry this beer is all too easy to consume in large quantities Hopped with Styrian Goldings Formerly Ozzy Ale

Our first beer in the Reserve Series Melange Trois begins with wonderfully big Strong Belgian Style Blonde Ale and moves into the extraordinary category through an additional month French Oak Chardonnay Wine Barrel maturation The essense of Chardonnay permeates while subtle sweetness remains from the Ale itself Oak tannins combine to create fascinating mesh of dry sweet and wine like character One of our favorites
Ale brewed with spices

Formerly Gouden Carolus Cuvée Van De Keizer Rood Gouden Carolus Cuvée van de Keizer Imperial Blond is strong blond beer that was launched in on the occasion of years Gouden Carolus Cuvée van de Keizer Imperial Dark However it contains more types of malt and different kinds of herbs are added during the brewing process Its bright golden color high alcohol percentage and full and well balanced taste make this ale genuine source of vitality and power which will please even the most critical connoisseur For ideal savoring gently pour out in one fluent movement at temperature of Proudly poured it is savored with respect Those who like refreshing heavy and somewhat spicy beer choose this blonde ale
A super fruity dry hopped Belgian sextuple with notes of cardamon IBU

This beer was initially brewed by the now defunct Seigneuriale brewery in Boucherville Unibroue decided to revive it in in honour of its name and unique recipe The Régime Seigneurial flourished in New France until the mid nineteenth century In Pierre Boucher Sieur de Grosbois established seigneurie in Boucherville on the South Shore of Montreal The last three seigneurs resided in the sumptuous François Pierre Boucher manor of Boucherville which was built in the s and declared historical monument in This ale is dedicated to these ancestral roots

Award winning Kentucky Bourbon Barrel Ale is unique sipping beer with the distinctive nose of well crafted bourbon Our Kentucky Ale is aged for up to weeks in freshly decanted bourbon barrels from some of Kentucky finest distilleries Subtle yet familiar flavors of vanilla and oak are imparted to this special ale as it rests in the charred barrels Pleasantly smooth and robust Kentucky Bourbon Barrel Ale may also be served as an aperitif or after dinner drink

For this beer we use maple syrup from Red Brook Farm Sam family farm in Western Massachusetts peat smoked barley juniper berries and vanilla Immort is fermented with blend of English and Belgian yeasts then aged in the big oak tanks at the brewery The sweet and earthy flavors meld magnificently in the Immort Ale But be warned the ABV is so after one or two you may start feeling immortal even though we promise you won be IBU

Matured for daysFirst brewed in to commemorate the th anniversary of Fuller Smith Turner this bottle conditioned recipe is inspired by the original Fuller brewing books The Amber malt and Goldings hops combine to create delicious fruitcake aroma As this beer is bottle conditioned we recommend it is stored upright and poured carefully

Some of the oak casks at Samuel Smith date back more than century with the individual oak staves being replaced by the Old Brewery coopers over the years Gradually the casks soak in more more of the character of the ale fermented in stone Yorkshire squares Yorkshire Stingo is aged for at least year matured in these well used oak casks in the brewery underground cellars deriving fruit raisin treacle toffee Christmas pudding and slight oaky flavours before being further naturally conditioned in bottle Not suitable for vegans

Fomerly Thomas Jefferson Tavern AleThis powerful and complex golden ale pays homage to Founding Father and fellow brewer Thomas Jefferson Yards Brewmaster Tom Kehoe worked closely with Philadelphia historic City Tavern to recreate this recipe employing honey rye and wheat just like the beer Jefferson made at Monticello
Our famous English style Strong Ale deep garnet red in color with smooth hardy taste and nice warm feeling to follow IBU
An English style strong ale This brown ale has great malt depth and drinks like session beer

Once Maine legendary seasonal specialty Hampshire is now available year round Hampshire has huge toasted malt flavor balanced by assertive hoppiness The finish is long and lingering with the malt and hop notes blending with alcohol warmth Original gravity alcohol by volume two row English malts pale crystal and chocolate Cascade Mt Hood and East Kent Golding hops

Named after Robinsons brewery cat Old Tom is almost as old as the brewery itself It is recognised both nationally and internationally as one of the most famous strong ales winning some of the industry most prestigious awards including World Best Ale Old Tom is dark rich and warming with cherry brandy like colour and character This strong ale has booming balance of ripe malt and peppery hops combined with roasted nut and chocolate flavours with smoky richness distinctive deep port wine finish with bitter hops balance complemented by heady vinous aromas of dark fruit

A strong fine ale combines the malty taste with smooth raisin finish Challenger provides key herbal dry hop character First Gold and Goldings give some citrus fruit and crystal malt provides warming toffee in the main beer of this blended ale The use of some old X ale adds dried fruit and raisin and produces complex flavoured and richly satisfying ale The tradition of brewing Strong Suffolk Ale and maturing in Oak Vats is one that unlike other UK brewers GK have continued the practice is mentioned in in connection with GK

Bracia is the Celtic name for beverage brewed in Iron Age Europe with reference found on Roman inscription at Haddon Hall Derbyshire Little is known about this except it was high in alcohol brewed with cereals and most probably honey Thornbridge Bracia has been infused with generous amount of dark and bitter Chestnut Honey sourced from the Alpine foothills of North East Italy

Bartender if anyone calls m not here right Every year it the same nightmare hauling that over sized red suited endomorph all over kingdom come up to my shivering haunches in snow and muck You call him Saint Slave driver more like Going down in history is all well and good but what about the here and now My therapist says have to start doing thing for me for change It about time had Merry Christmas myself don you think

Formerly known as Vern Reviews from are for the initial pilot batch Vern of what would become Track the next year experimental re mix track Track is our Angel Share that we aged in fresh Heaven Hill Bourbon barrels for months To this we added some awesome whole peach slivers black tea and splash of Brettanomyces Clausenni to ferment the peaches The beer has great peach nose and long carmelized bourbon finish One of the most experimental of all the track series beers

The result is smooth bourbon character balanced by caramel malt sweetness and classic English hops Schlafly Bourbon Barrel Ale is seamless blend of Schlafly Barleywine style ale and our pale ale aged in Kentucky Bourbon Barrels
Brewed at our ancestral home in Glasgow Tennent Beer Aged with Whisky Oak draws on lifetime commitment to brewing ales and lagers through the passion and expertise of our brewers

A subtle snap of ginger makes Ginger Tom lively breed indeed giving that lovely purring warmth for those cold winter nights or over ice for refreshing summers drink Specially brewed using an infusion of Chinese bruised ginger root and botanical extracts this warming speciality ale has pronounced ginger and spiced herb palate complemented by sweet roasted malt dryness and wonderful ginger afterburn
Brewed Bottled for Levens Hall Cumbria www levenshall co ukBrewers rich dark and mysterious ale brewed to the ancient recipe held secret at Levens Hall for over years

A fresh coffee and chocolate experience infused with genuine Arabica coffee beans and fine Belgian chocolate blended with locally grown roasted malts creating tremendous coffee shop aroma and flavour and generous hop flavour

Formerly known as FOUR FOUR is classic English style Strong Ale The biscuity Maris Otter and caramelly Crystal malts contribute notes of toast toffee and dried fruits which are perfectly balanced with blend of authentic UK Fuggle and East Kent Golding hops Dry hopped with Northdown FOUR is complex and satisfying ale
A strong English ale not too hoppy and reddish brown in colour It is dark malty brew full in taste with sweet dry finish

A superbly balanced beer golden in appearance with peaty smoky aromas and smooth whisky flavours from peated malt With measure of English Whisky from St George Distillery in Norfolk it is rich in flavour and superb after dinner drink

Centurion Ghost is multiple gold medal award winning dark ruby ale It has smooth roasted malt palate and combination of Challenger Fuggle and Bramling Cross hops give it subtle bitterness with autumn fruit flavours that linger on the aftertaste

La Fin du Monde was developed through months of research on unique strain of yeast originating from Europe It is brewed in honor of the intrepid European explorers who believed they had reached the end of the world when they discovered North America the new world This triple style golden ale recreates the style of beer originally developed in the Middle Ages by trappist monks for special occasions and as such it was the first of its kind to be brewed in North America

A magical mystical Monkey whose golden sole glows with the wisdom of the ages This radiant ale is rich in the spirited tradition of Belgian inspired brewing Our Golden Monkey is both playfully delightful and profoundly satisfying Exotic spice from the East rounds out this global journey to joy Get on board This Monkey bound for glory
Labeled Chimay Cinq Cents in ml bottle This blonde ale is dry and floral with slight hop bitterness The hoppiest Chimay ale Cinq Cents was created by famed brewmaster Father Theodore in
grains barley wheat oat Styrian hops

First brewed back in Curieux was our first foray into barrel aging To make Curieux we take our Tripel and let it age in bourbon barrels for seven weeks Once that time is up we take the beer out of our cold cellars and blend it back with portion of fresh Tripel The resulting rich golden ale features smooth notes of coconut vanilla and hint of bourbon

Our Trippel has always been big beautiful Belgian style ale but in we tweaked the recipe to include new yeast variety and even more complex malt profile This golden beer opens with bold blast of spicy Noble hops courtesy of Saaz and Hallertau Mittlefruh and gives way to the fruity aromas offered by our traditional Belgian yeast Brewed with Pilsner and Munich malts Trippel is classically smooth and complex and sings with high note of sweet citrus before pleasantly dry finish delivers warm strong boozy bite Give Trippel sip to get you smiling

Don de Dieu Gift of God was the name of the ship that Samuel de Champlain sailed on his mission to explore and discover the vast and perilous land of America in the name of the King of France His travels led to the founding of Quebec City in Inspired by this great adventure Unibroue created Don de Dieu an abbey style triple wheat beer refermented in the bottle Soft and round it has delicately nuanced fruity and hoppy notes
This strong golden ale is marked by passion fruit and herbal notes in the aroma with suggestions of banana and honey in the complex palate The Tripel has remarkably long and smooth finish

Merry Monks ABV is Belgian style Tripel Pilsner malt combined with an Abbey yeast strain yields remarkable and complex flavor packed with notes of spice banana and pear Nicely balanced with moderate to dry finish Merry Monks is bottle conditioned which imparts special effervescence to the beer and creamier carbonation The ongoing fermentation inside the bottle will change the character of the beer as it ages and you ll find it becomes dryer with age You may want to lay down few bottles for future evaluation We suggest storing at cellar temperatures around and away from light This brew is available year round Keep your eye out for Merry Monks in oz cork and cage champagne bottles for an exceptional experience

Our Summer seasonal Trade Winds Tripel is Belgian style Golden Ale with Southeast Asian twist Instead of using candi sugar typical for such beer we use rice in the mash to lighten the body and increase the gravity and spice with Thai Basil The result is an aromatic digestible and complex beer made for lazy summer evening IBU
La Trappe Tripel aroma is slightly malty and estery Despite its full rich flavour this out of the ordinary ale still has light and dry aftertaste with touch of bitter finesse
Aged in oak barrels hand bottled corked caged bottled conditioned

Why is the Grim Reaper holding mailbox Well that mailbox is from dead Dark Horse beer The Grim Reaper better know as Death was quite found of our classic Sapient Summer Wheat Ale When we changed it into Belgian Style Triple Death thought it would only be appropriate to bring something from that beer into this beer So he picked the mailbox and we weren about to argue with him You can say what you want about him but that Death sure has big heart So anyway we brewed this beer with Trappist yeast strain so it is very traditional The flavors are incredibly complex with notes of mild fruit and finishes with bit of clove Although this beer is higher in alcohol it is very smooth and finishes dry on the palate

ORABELLE is brewed with barley wheat oats and rye This Belgian Style Tripel is golden beauty Its two yeast strains orange peel and dash of coriander impart surprising complexity and richness to this delicate ale Don let Orabelle demure nature fool you this is one flavorful pour Watch out she a charmer one sip and you ll be in love IBU
Belgian Style Tripel brewed with Citra Brewers Gold and Saaz hops IBU
This inspired Belgian style Trippel has hazy golden hue and the aroma of citrus with hints of banana and clove Predominant Belgian malt flavors give way to subdued bitterness in the finish

Similar to Belgian style Strong Pales the Tripel is often characterized by its lighter color spicy aromatics and complexity Brother David Triple is brewed with copious amounts of pale malts as well as Belgian candi sugar giving it deep golden hue medium body and rich mouth feel The dense head gives off aromas of candied orange peel clover honey pears and hint of freshly mown fields The fruity esters and spicy hop flavors balance the phenolic characteristics leading to peppery citrusy finish

Formerly James BeanBarrel Bean starts its life as our Tripel Belgian style golden ale We age that beer in bourbon barrels for just shy of two months before blending it with cold brewed coffee from Speckled Ax Maine coffee roaster The sun dried Ethiopian beans in the coffee are known for their stone fruit and dark berry flavors The finished beer features rich notes of caramel bourbon and coffee
Our take on Belgian Style Tripel Ale brewed with spices and fermented with Trappist yeast strain which lends hints of vanilla and creates variety of complex flavors
Triple Aged In Apple Brandy Barrels

This beer has white smooth and very compact head Its pale amber colour is very characteristic revealing distinctive maltiness It has rich aroma with unique combination of aromatic hops spices and the typical bouquet of fermentation very fruity Secondary fermentation in the bottle gives it unique aroma due to the presence of yeast St Feuillien Triple has very strong and exceptionally lingering taste thanks to its density and its long storage period Whether served as refreshing aperitif in summer or savoured during the winter months the Triple is connoisseur beer par excellence

Dragonmead signature product This is the ultimate Belgian style The very high gravity of this beer is balanced by the smoothness of its finish Banana and Clove aromas come from the Belgian yeast strain combining with the generous dose of Belgian Candi Sugar The Saaz hops help to give this beer balanced bitterness with no noticeable hop aroma

Inspired by nature untamed beauty LaGrave pronounced gräv is the first of our oz corked and caged bottle releases Bottle conditioned and highly carbonated this Triple Golden Ale is steeped in the tradition of strong ales originally brewed in Belgium The unique Belgian yeast forms the bedrock of LaGrave complex flavors Strong and alluring at ABV LaGrave boasts sweet fruity flavor with well rounded mouthfeel and semi dry lingering bitter finish

We turned our regular Damnation recipe into Tripel It is bittered with Tomahawk and has Sterling and Cascade in the mid boil and finish The beer was then aged on new American oak chips for two to three weeks
Belgian inspired Tripel ale Golden Monkey aged for months in oak white wine bbls

This is our Belgian Style Trippel aged on intimate fruits of Passion Fruit Raspberry and Cherry Lightly spiced with corriander and curqua orange peel and other spices of passion Light Reddish hue and with alcohol strength of and nicely carbonated in the bottle Enjoy couple and have your own Voodoo Love Child

Guldenberg is tripel style abbey ale containing vol Alc Its colour is blond and it made of pale malt with the addition of candy sugar The bitterness comes from the Hallertau hops we use as bitterhop and as aromahop On top of that we use dry hopping techniques with the same hops which give the ale its unique flavour and aroma and its perfect balance between sweet and bitter The name came from the former Guldenberg Abbey in Wevelgem the village of birth of Nino one of the brewers According to data in Flandria Illustrata ale was brewed here in the past

First brewed in Eau Benite Oh Bey Knit Holy Water was developed to offer the characteristics of bottle refermented triple with slightly lower alcohol content This is refreshing pale golden ale with slightly fruity nose and pleasant character
A Belgian Trappist triple yeast culture balanced with the finest imported pale barley Belgian aromatic malt and oats gives this golden ale fruity bouquet and light refined taste
This is the house beer for the famous De Garre pub in Brugges Belgium Brewed using traditional Belgian triple base with three times the amount of malt allows the brewer to achieve the ABV

The short days and long nights bring this prowling cat out on the town looking to scatch up some fun with great beer This Night Cat is dark in color bold in hop but not heavy in body It is full of tropical fruit notes from the Citra hops that combine with nice dark wheat malt flavor

This winter wheat beer uses dark malting to provide subtle toasty notes We then single hop and dry hop this beer with Citra hops from our friend Brad farm Interesting pineapple notes from the Citra hop provide stark contrast to the toasty notes in the body An engaging and sessionable Winter Seasonal IBU
Formerly River Ale
IBU
A fantastic Dark Wheat Clean roasty round and surprisingly dry Incredibly drinkable

Buckets burlap bags and pickup truck beds are filled with black walnuts each fall in the Ozarks The rich and lively flavor of the wild hand harvested black walnut is renowned flavor of the region We re proud to continue celebrating local flavor and tradition with our handcrafted Black Walnut Wheat Ale IBU

From the distinctive red amber hues to aromas of biscuits and sweetness of caramel this beer is not to be taken lightly Wild Rose WRed Wheat is hand crafted striking fine balance between malt and hops The final result is beer that is crisp clean and refreshing IBU
Sweet malt and roasted grains Sheer Madness pours dark with lighter refreshing taste

We were inspired to creat our own iteration of Bavarian style Weizenbock style known for being rich malty with notes of chocolate bananas toasted malt Ours was styled to be play on chocolate covered banana so we selected toasted carob pods to provide intense earthy chocoalte flavors rounded out by aging on Madagascar vanilla beans Brewd with malted wheat dark Munich malt chocolate wheat fermented with traditional weizen yeast to boost teh banana spice notes that typify the style

Crafted with Hallertau Hersbrucker hops and four specialty malts carared melanodium caramunich crystal and wheat this amber ale has biscuity and toffee malt flavours that linger on the front palate The relative sweetness is perfectly balanced by traditional ale yeast and hop combination IBU
IBU
This FreshFest collaboration with ShuBrew in Pittburgh PA is rare treat dark wheat ale brewed with cacao nibs vanilla lactose and Oreo cookies Think mocha cookie crumble frappuccino in liquid form

Our Red Wheat is variation of our Honey Wheat It is reddish copper in color due to generous addition of colored malts that also contribute slight caramel taste Wheat malt is added to make up of the total malt bill Nicely balanced with light addition of German Perle and Tettnang hops very easy to drink yet flavorful and light beer IBU
Our Dark Wheat is made from wheat malt and Hallertau hops are used to form well hopped amber beer Most try this beer with lemon but you can usually catch the brewer enjoying it with lime

Oberon is wheat ale fermented with Bell signature house ale yeast mixing spicy hop character with mildly fruity aromas The addition of wheat malt lends smooth mouthfeel making it classic summer beer Made with only ingredients and without the use of any spices or fruit Oberon is the color and scent of sunny afternoon
An American wheat beer with refreshing crisp citrus finish This delicious session beer is brewed with boatloads of Amarillo hops IBU
An American Wheat brewed with malted wheat lemon zest and grains of paradise rare pepper from Africa first used as brewing spice in the th Century to create crisp and spicy flavor and body
Crisp bright flavor shines like city lights on Lake Michigan Hazy and unfiltered our award winning Urban Wheat Ale flavor flows from start to finish IBU

Kettle soured wheat ale First brewed in at our original brewery in downtown Kalamazoo Oarsman Ale grew out of our desire to explore the tradition of session beers and to create unique flavorful experience for everyone no matter what the occasion Tart and refreshing this sessionable bright Wheat Ale exudes citrus and lemony aromas from Cascade hops and trades sour intensity for finesse perfect companion for any occasion Oarsman Ale is beer based in tradition but with that distinctive Bell twist perfect beer to compliment any menu

Boulevard Unfiltered Wheat Beer is lively refreshing ale with natural citrusy flavor and distinctive cloudy appearance This easy drinking American style wheat beer has become our most popular offering and the best selling craft beer in the Midwest IBU
Unfiltered and unfettered Circus Boy is unique and refreshing American style Hefeweizen Is he who Or what Or perhaps some of both Be amazed by the flavorful haze of this wonderful wheat beer IBU

With roots in two of today most popular brewing styles Acre Hoppy Wheat Beer is the result of careful cultivation by our brewers and cellarmen Their efforts to craft hybrid yielded bumper crop of flavor delightfully distinctive ale with the aroma of an IPA and the refreshing taste of wheat beer IBU

UFO Hefeweizen is an American unfiltered wheat beer Perhaps UFO initial sensory perception is also its most prominent cloudy golden color and dense frothy head The yeast which has not been filtered out accounts for the cloudiness of UFO Wheat malt tends to create larger head than barley malt the cereal grain most often used in brewing When served in traditional wheat beer glass with lemon UFO presents an appealing and distinctive visual image The aroma has faint but clear citrus like character This is produced by the special yeast and accounts for the Bavarian tradition of serving hefeweizens with lemon The lemon accentuates the yeast fruity tart fragrance UFO has soft mouthfeel and refreshing light body The wheat malts and subtle hopping give the beer mild delicate flavor UFO has clean finish Unlike some imported hefeweizens UFO does not have the spicy tropical flavors typical of European brewed style IBU

Fortunate Islands combines the bangin hop aroma of an über tropical IPA with the crisp refreshing drinkability of killer pale ale We achieve this magical result by starting with mild nutty malt backbone then dry hopping the bejesus out of it with Citra and Amarillo hops Restrained bitterness and vibrant notes of mango tangerine and passion fruit combine to form sessionable crusher of mind bending proportions It tastes like wizards

Swimming in fresh water pool at the base of cascading waterfall is what we all imagine we would find in paradise On Maui follow the old Hana Highway and you will find such place Wailua Falls This plunging cascade of clear water is the inspiration for our Limited Release Wailua Wheat Ale This golden sun colored ale has bright citrus flavor that comes from the tropical passion fruit we brew into each batch Sit back relax and enjoy paradise anytime IBU

Trout Slayer is filtered wheat ale fermented at cool temperatures making it smooth drinkable session beer Brewed with Palisade Glacier and Mt Hood hops this straw colored beer is sure to please any craft beer drinker
A ridable ale hosting some wheatey nuts juicy Motueka hop bolts The deliverer of this truth Akari Shogun He who harnesses light will usher this summer force into your life
Ale brewed with blood orange peels honey and spices

Enjoy Poolside or Sprinklerside Breck Brew SummerBright is the result The craftsman touch combines white wheat two row pale and munich malt with the pacific northwest most intriguing hops to create bright clean ale ideal for picnicking evenings on the screen porch and enjoying the whims of the summer breeze

Brewed in the style of mid th century English Festival Ale this unfiltered wheat beer displays translucent orange color topped with creamy white head Wheat enhances the mouthfeel of the beer and produces pleasant bread like notes while Michigan honey provides caramelized sweetness in the flavor profile This beer is spiced with orange peel and coriander and small amounts of three hop varieties pleasantly counterbalances the sweetness Brewed with Michigan honey OG IBU
Maui Gold pineapple gives sweet aroma to this smooth bodied tropical brew IBU

From mild to wild this one the perfect companion for whatever you re up for Crisp wheat smoothness gives way to touch of coriander snap and kiss of sweet orange peel perk that lingers on your lips With beautiful cloudy golden hue and ample head this one makes you love her more with every pour IBU
Four types of West Coast hops add bold notes of pine and juicy grapefruit to this deep golden wheat ale for crisp flavor that a refreshing escape from winter lingering chill

Contact High is our summer seasonal inspired by the American craft movement We made this wheat ale exciting by adding pacific northwest hops and dry hopping with orange zest Contact high pours bright orange hue with bit citrus aroma Citrus zest hops wheat summer

Nicie is an American Wheat Ale brewed with orange zest lemon zest coriander and hint of peppercorn Orange gold in color and light in body Nicie is infused with the scents and flavors of fresh citrus The subtle taste of coriander and spice of peppercorn makes this ale both refreshing and complex Nicie is the perfect accompaniment to summer day

Shock Top Wheat IPA is no traditional beer It a unique hybrid that combines the fresh flavor and smoothness of wheat beer with the crisp hop bitterness of an IPA The result is beer that is truly like no other To serve pour down the side of the glass until half inch is left in the bottle Swirl the remaining brew and pour to produce rich thick collar of foam that releases the citrusy Cascade hop aroma

Brewed with wheat this hoppy golden American ale features Galaxy and Citra in the dry hop Bright aromatics of overripe peach orange rind and green herbal hops flood the nose while balanced flavors of tropical fruit citrus and creamy wheat excite the palate Refreshingly light bodied with soft fluffy mouthfeel Pier finishes dry with slightly mineral bitterness MALT Pilsner White Wheat Flaked Wheat DextrineHOPS Galaxy Citra Columbu

We ve kicked it up notch by adding tropical twist to this refreshing ale Get amped on Passion Fruit Kicker jaw dropping mouth watering smooth brew with sweet tart fruity flavor We layer passion fruit tea and passion fruit juice with wheat malt and row malted barley to bring you this exhilarating crowd pleaser Your palate will do for more of this luscious wheat ale

An American style wheat ale brewed with malted Low hopping rates allow the refreshing aroma and citrus flavor of late addition of lemon grass to dominate This unfiltered beer retains all of its protein flavor and some of its yeast resulting in traditionally cloudy appearance
Subtle hints of citrus round out the complex aroma of Mosaic hops for beer so drinkable it ll last through multiple acts
A Belgo American Ale brewed with domestic barley and French wheat malts the finest Continental and S grown hops and fermented with Belgian English and Wild yeasts

As the sun starts to peek out from around the dark winter clouds it is clear reminder that brighter days lie ahead Deviating from the original recipe this new and improved Sun Block comes with little more oomph in flavor but still has that great summertime body

The traditional American Wheat Ale serves as solid baseline but we couldn be content until we tore the roof off this sucker Funk our Blueberry Citrus Wheat Ale sets the rhythm with soulful fusion of American wheat and hops before unleashing stunning encore with big notes of blueberry and Meyer lemon It no jive you ll just dig it
The base for this beer is Willy Wheat They add Vanilla to the tanks during aging Try mixing it with Alpine Captain Stout for Captain Vanille Draft availability only
A wheat ale fermented with real red and black raspberries and accented with fresh lemongrass It has stunning red color and mouth watering berry aroma Fruity and refreshingly dry
Inspired by Ohio little sure shot Annie Oakley our session wheat IPA is peppered with rounds of whole orange peel and fully loaded with Jarrylo hops

An Imperial Wheat Ale brewed with blood orange juice tangerine and grapefruit peels Citrus Peel Out is the newest in the company seasonal Imperial Series It features an ABV grain bill consisting of wheat CTZ Mosaic hops and walloping amount of citrus Over four and half pounds of tangerine grapefruit peel per barrel accompany tropical flavors from Mosaic hops and an added boost of blood orange juice during fermentation This refreshing brew sits around IBU and its nice citrus pith complements the bitterness Residual sweetness helps accentuate the fruity character and masks the ABV well Southern Tier founder Phin DeMink notes We encourage craft beer connoisseurs and folks new to craft to enjoy it straight up or served on the rocks with soda wedge of fresh fruit We ve loved it with simple syrup shot of our favorite spirit No matter how you serve it Citrus Peel Out is the summer refresher you re looking for

Canebrake is crisp and smooth with beautiful golden honey color This refreshing American wheat style brew highlights sweet remnants of sugarcane with notes of honey spice and citrus on the finish new Louisiana tradition Canebrake was the first commerical beer in the world brewed with local sugarcane syrup IBU

Our dark wheat beer is impressive with its creamy white foam fruity fresh sweetness and hints of mature bananas harmonise with delicious flavours of roasted malt sparkling and full bodied with light caramel taste on the first sip An excellent accompaniment from hearty meals and game to chocolate and nut desserts Brewed according to our centuries old brewing tradition on the Weihenstephan hill

Holiday traditions come in all shapes and sizes Ours come in freshly wrapped bottles and cans This old world dunkelweizen is brewed with Texas peaches and roasted pecans perfect for cracking open in front of crackling fire

Also labelled as Erdinger Hefe Weizen DunkelCarefully selected dark malts with delicate roasting aromas give ERDINGER Dunkel its full bodied flavor and strong character This elegant wheat beer has lustrous deep dark brown appearance in the glass The first sip reveals harmonious symphony of carefully selected wheat and barley malts with exquisite Hallertau aroma hops The taste buds detect hints of caramel nuts and fresh bread An unmistakable top fermenting accent is provided by ERDINGER traditional yeast ERDINGER Dunkel first saw the light of day in when ERDINGER master brewers created dark wheat beer as birthday present for the private brewery owner Werner Brombach He liked it so much that he decided to put it on the market in

The union of wheaty freshness and dark malt often produces fullness of taste and complexity explains the world famous English beer commentator Michael Jackson This also applies to the Ayinger Urweisse which is strong amber colored yeast cloudy wheat beer The beer is strong with the first taste and malty in aroma The top fermented yeasty taste sensation is unmistakable This beer is rich in sparkle and has just touch of special bitter quality The fruity malty mild aroma will have you won you over immediately

This dark Weissbier retains its aromatic character thanks to the select choice of Hallertau aroma hops and highest quality Bavarian wheat and dark barley malts Its characteristic distinctive maroon colour is feast for the eyes Then there the opalescence and fine structure of the yeast turbidity The perfect complement is provided by the very creamy fine pored head This dark Weissbier from the Holy Mountain will delight connoisseurs with harmonious interplay of fruity odours above all ripe bananas and pineapple with undertones of caramel and cocoa Andechser Weissbier Dunkel teases the tongue with delicate tanginess carried by round soft body light caramel sweetness harmonises well with the fine hoppy bitterness It concludes on soft and refreshing note

We affectionately refer to the first beer in our Revolution series of modern American craft beer as our unusual little bird It a little on the flighty side ABV and it a little on the wacky side because we brew it with finely milled chestnuts genus castanea for you nut freaks Willamette hops and we ferment it with Bavarian Weissbier yeast strain All of these nuances contribute to its nutty personality IBU

Dragon Breath is Dark Wheat Hefeweizen otherwise known as Dunkelweizen It is mild in taste unfiltered and moderately hopped with Hallertauer Perle hops cold fermented eliminating any harsh aftertaste This award winning Bavarian classic was brought to America by our German Brewmaster Jurgen
Also known as Shiner Dark Hefeweizen

We stay with the German wheat beer theme for our Fall seasonal and much like it Summertime sister Dunks Ferry Dunkelweizen has unique banana and spicy clove character but this time paired with chewy bready dare we say banana bread malt backbone Again we hop this German wheat beer with Hallertau and Tettnanger hops

Dunkelweizen translates from German to mean dark wheat Gordon Biersch Dunkelweizen highlights the undertones of dark roasted malted wheat and the unique flavors produced by our special Hefeweizen yeast strain Our Dunkelweizen adheres to all of the traditions of the Reinheitsgebot German Purity Law of and is naturally carbonated

Creamy head and smooth carbonation complement its deep mahogany color Bouquet teems with chocolate apple and clove Roasted malts intertwine with Tettnanger hops creating depth of complex flavors Smooth roasted malts and dark caramel leads to clean finish unlike any other dark wheat beer

The dark Kirta Weissbier was originally created as Festbier for the Altöttinger Kirta The addition of dark malt and roasted malt results in rich mahogany color and fruity malty flavor Adept beer tasters will even notice slight hint of chocolate The Kirta white beer goes perfectly with hearty dishes with dark sauces such as roast beef grilled beef loin beer goulash obatzter and chocolate desserts The Kirta is cloudy orange beer with small white head The aroma is mostly roasted malt as well as light fruitiness The taste is sweet malty and slightly fruity
This dark wheat ale has touch of roastiness crisp refreshing character with medium body

Our golden yellow wheat beer with its fine poured white foam smells of cloves and impresses consumers with its refreshing banana flavour It is full bodied and with smooth yeast taste To be enjoyed at any time goes excellently with fish and seafood with spicy cheese and especially with the traditional Bavarian veal sausage Brewed according to our centuries old brewing tradition on the Weihenstephan hill

Our Bavarian style wheat beer is complex with flavors reminiscent of banana bread and spicy clove This hazy golden beer glows with suspended yeast creating velvety texture and refreshing finish Kellerweis is one of the few wheat beers made using the traditional Bavarian method of open fermentation which allows the ingredients to shine and creates vast depth and character in this hazy golden beer To serve pour two thirds into glass swirl the bottles and add the rest

Our unfiltered Hacker Pschorr Weissbier is naturally cloudy full flavoured and uniquely refreshing Georg Pschorr in his day owner of the Pschorr brewery and man of true foresight spread word of this exquisite and enjoyable Hefe Weissbier and made it popular beyond the borders of Bavaria

Modeled after the classic wheat beers of Bavaria Hefeweizen is cloudy and straw colored with meringue like head that lingers to the bottom of the glass Brewed with an ample volume of wheat malt and few hops this beer features unique yeast strain that produces harmonious notes of clove banana and vanilla throughout this effervescent brew traditional interpretation of classic style this idiosyncratic Bavarian beer is perfectly at home here in Texas

If you dream of wheat this brew will get your toes tapping Since we have brewed Bavarian style wheat beers exclusively for the same great state that grows and malts our own Wisconsin wheat In world full of posers this is true hefe weizen naturally bottle fermented and hazy Expect this beer to cascade effervescent into your glass The rich spicy clove and cinnamon notes will greet your nose while sweet fruit and wheat kisses your lips Lick the foam from your mouth and admit sometimes you just gotta get up and dance

Why are the Bavarian Royal Family and King Ludwig so important to brewing history The Bavarian Royal family had sole rights to brewing of Hefe Weizen in Bavaria for years No wonder they are leading experts on wheat brews

As you might ve guessed we re from Germany but what might surprise you is that we re the world first Hefeweizen wheat beer grapefruit beer Best served cold it the perfect casual brew to cool you off during the summer but it can be enjoyed all year round any time of the day It a true blend of total refreshment made from Schofferhofer Hefeweizen blended with carbonated juice of natural ingredients

A wheat ale combining German wheat and barley malts oats torrified wheat and whole flower Tettnang and Citra hops this fruity and warming holiday brew delivers refreshing finish with spicy hints of banana clove and citrus

Hazy golden and filled with smooth wheat character our Hefeweizen is our take on the classic German beer Notes of clove and banana signatures of this traditional style accent the aroma and flavor and are complemented by subtle bready malt character Clean and crisp this beer pairs best with sunny summer day HOP VARIETIESHallertau Mittelfrueh and Spalt Spalter Noble hopsMALT VARIETIESSamuel Adams two row pale malt blend White Wheat IBU

Our unfiltered and refreshing German style wheat beer is full on flavor yet light on the palate Authentic hefeweizen yeast creates the compelling aromas of bananas citrus and cloves while the all wheat and malt body perfectly captures the brilliance of golden Florida sunset

Ebel Weiss beer is very traditional German Hefeweizen that is naturally unfiltered It has wonderful malt sweetness and soft aroma of clove vanilla and banana This deep golden colored weiss will make you think you are in Bavaria

Since Saint Joseph Day on March Andechs Weissbier Hell has found many new friends Untreated and bottled in its natural state of yeasty turbidity this is top fermented beer for the epicure Its light honey colour makes it an immediate eyecatcher Then there the opalescence and fine structure of the yeast turbidity At the same time the creamy fine pored head invites you to get to know this light Weissbier from the Holy Mountain You ll need two takes to enjoy the aromas to the full First distinctive fruity aromas like banana and honeydew melon come to the fore followed by fine cloves Andechser Weissbier Hell is very tangy refreshing treat with the conviction of full soft body It concludes on finely balanced interplay of light sweet honey and delicate acidity with undertones of bitter hoppiness that quickly subside into harmonious aftertaste Weissbier that embodies slice of the Andechs lifestyle finely yeasty tangy and sparkling it refreshes and renews the thirst for more

Shotgun Betty is sexy tough cowgirl who is always armed and dangerous Don be fooled by her good looks she will have you for an appetizer That why we picked her to represent our Hefeweizen Shotgun Betty is wheat beer with rich banana clove nose and refreshing dry finish Sound good Try one But beware once Betty gets hold of you there is no escape

An authentic example of Bavarian Hefeweizen Hefe means cloudy or yeasty and weizen means wheat This beer is made with mostly wheat and uses true Hefeweizen yeast that gives it fruity banana aroma with just hint of cloves The tart finish makes this the perfect summer beer IBU
A German style hefeweizen with fruity aroma and spicy finish

Our Hefeweizen is light unfiltered wheat beer often served with wedge of lemon Made with thirty percent American winter wheat Hefeweizen is balanced with sweet golden malted barley and Tettnang hops from Oregon that evoke hint of spice The American ale yeast is subtle but the grains take center stage and when left in the unfiltered beer gives it that classic cloudiness and additional body The German Hefeweizen say hay fuh vite sin traces its history to th century Bavaria and eventually came to America with the wave of German immigrants in the th century Although the rise of light lager beer diminished the sales of wheat beers on both sides of the Atlantic the sale of wheat beers began to rise after WWII especially in Southern Germany where unique ale yeast strain fermented the beer with banana and clove esters In the late th Century the new American craft brewers sought out lighter style to complement their beer selection and brewed Hefeweizens with the same yeast strains they used to brew their Pale Ales and Stouts IBU
German Hefeweizen Belgian Witbier hybrid brewed with coriander and citrus peel

Bavaria fabled Ludwig was said to be mad The same might be said of us for approaching this German beer style with fistfuls of hops beyond the norm for this style and yeast from Belgium CompositionMalt Imported two row German malts including wheatHops Whole flower German hopsABV FlavorHigh powered with all German malts and the subtle spicy complexity of our special yeast Mad King Weiss offers quenching quality that can be beat

Collaboration with Sierra Nevada Brewing Co Braupakt is collaboration between the world oldest brewery and Sierra Nevada Brewed using Weihenstephaner signature yeast and amarillo and chinook hops from Sierra Nevada

Hundreds of years ago in Germany wheat beers were considered breakfast or after church beers testament to their light refreshing flavor and tradition of drinking them on weekend occasions We invite you to enjoy our Hefeweizen hay fa VEIT sen any day of the week IBU

Brewmaster Phil Markowski has taken bahn less traveled to create our version of the classic Bavarian wheat brew perfect for the warming temperatures Beautifully cloudy with generous head of foam wonderful fruit aroma and dry finish our Hefeweizen is refreshing version of the original with just little bit more of everything

Authentic wheat beer brewed in the Southern German tradition won the Silver Medal in and the Gold Medal at the in Denver Colorado Penn Weizen is top fermented cask conditioned and very effervescent with slight hint of tangy clove flavor

The top fermented wheat beer is specially brewed to obtain tasty but also pungent wheat beer This special type of brewing allows particularly full and also very tasty wheat beer The amber color comes through special malt which also brings caramel like character and other taste facets in the beer The cloudiness receives this Benedictine wheat beer by the fine yeast which means an important flavor carrier for this beer type This top fermented yeast gives the wheat beer very fruity note that is even reminiscent of bananas special taste experience is the sweetness which is to enter into synergy with the fine dry aroma of the hop

US import name Erdinger Weissbier Crystal Clear Crystal clear with an inviting frothy head this lively wheat beer specialty features fruity fresh aromas With its extra portion of sparkling and energizing carbonic acid ERDINGER Kristall is especially refreshing Strong malted wheat notes combine with an elegant hop bouquet to round off the finish It gets its shining crystal clear appearance from intensive filtration Those who feel traditional Bavarian wheat beer is little too cloudy will love the clarity of this top quality ERDINGER beer

Weisse Weisse Baby is Bavarian style wheat beer that is as fresh as it gets Brewed with traditional Bavarian yeast from Weihenstephan WWB is somewhere in between kristal and hefe with its slight haze

A Medium malt body and slightly sweet onset is complimented by slight citrus undertones This beer finishes smooth with subtle banana notes

Literally crystal wheat Kristall Weizen is filtered pale Weissbier It pours crystal clear rather than yeast hazey Propeller Kristall Weizen is made with special Weizen yeast German Noble hops and equal amounts of barley and wheat malts Like its Hefeweizen counterpart Kristall Weizen develops richly textured firm white head in the glass Very light spritzy effervescent and refreshing on the palate with creamy texture and gentle lightly fruity character it finishes with touch of dryness Propeller Kristall Weizen pairs well with summer heat and good times Prost IBU

An American wheat ale filtered to crystal brilliance Montana was nicknamed the Treasure State for its numerous deposits of gold silver and precious sapphire gemstones Folks who have lived near the plains rivers and mountains of Montana have come to appreciate the Treasure State as state of mind It the way you feel when you re surrounded by the vast open spaces and towering land masses It that humbling sense of gratitude and wonder that one finds in the presence of things older and greater than one self We brew this filtered wheat ale in celebration of the place we call Montana It natural splendor surpasses any trove of gold or gems Made in Montana Treasured Everywhere IBUs SRM OG
A wheat beer with slightly sweet malt presence

ABV varies by batch The primary component of our White Oak ale is barrel aged wheat wine that we affectionately refer to as White Oak Sap Essentially summer barley wine style ale but made with wheat heavy grain base White Oak Sap is aged in used bourbon barrels for nearly year and comes out rich in flavors of coconut honey caramel and vanilla To compliment the already rich flavors of the beer we ve added cacao nibs and vanilla beans to give this beer the delicate flavor of white chocolate hence the name

White Oak is blended beer wheatwine aged in Bourbon barrels we call it White Oak Sap and Mischief our Golden Strong Ale Vivid caramel coconut and vanilla flavors blanketed in crisp yet robust wheat ale White Oak is an exercise of balance
One hundred percent barrel aged in maple syrup bourbon barrels and bourbon barrels over the course of sixteen months then blended using carefully calculated ratios for the ultimate final product
A barleywine style ale made with wheat malt wheatwine aged in bourbon barrels

Smuttynose Wheat Wine Ale is unique hybridization of two well known beer styles combining the rich voluptuous taste of traditional barleywine with the subtle tart flavors of an American wheat ale topped off with healthy dose of crisp herbaceous hops

The unsuspecting unicorn was decorating eggs when out of NO HARE he heard Your ass is artificial grass Before The Unicorn could get peep the Easter Bunny in ball of furry attacked with kung bunny fu foo carrot chops The Unicorn whipped the hare back and forth fighting Bunny intense hop kick with wheat wine Don worry The Easter Bunny was charged with Energizer battery The Unicorn will live to dye another day All puns aside we ve changed up the recipe on this batch of Easter Bunny vs Unicorn It fuller in body with more wheat We ve also added Hallerteau Blanc hops to the dry hop It delicious

White Mocha is our bourbon barrel aged wheatwine style ale known as White Oak Sap with fresh coffee beans and cacao nibs Rich notes of coffee and chocolate are joined by warm flavors of coconut honey and vanilla that rise and shine on the palate

Hey pal this ain just some sweet little thang This fierce frosted goddess is none other than Strawberry Shortcake righteous wheat wine brewed with just enough whole strawberries and fragrant vanilla beans to temper its ferocious nature So beer bros take heed it time to hail to the queen baby
